name: Ramprasad
title: Decent earphones for the price
content: This is my third Bluetooth neckband, I own a House of Marley, a Realme Bud and this one. A brief comparison on some key parameters and a short review of this one.. Battery: The Realme does standout, lasts much longer than the other two, charging too is quite fast, the Infinity Glide came fully charged and dropped to 80% with about 60 minutes of usage, at this rate I guess it may last for just about 5-6 hours at the most. Charging is reasonably fast.. Comfort: This is pretty light and comfortable, the wires connecting the buds are not as stiff as the realme ones, the original earbuds fit perfectly and caused no pain or discomfort, the band round the neck too is comfortable, better than the Realme and the House of Marley. All three come with extra pairs of buds. Fits well and does not pop out while jogging or walking, the same holds for the other two devices compared as well.. Sound quality: The house of Marley was good while it lasted, alas, the Right bud stopped working after two years. The Realme too is good, though I found the highs missing in a few popular songs. The Infinity Glide is just about ok, the bass is present, but I found the highs missing, and some songs, thought the vocals sounded a bit dull (sort of muffled), but tastes differ. House of Marley was the best followed by the Realme, this one would just be ok for me. Both the Realme and the Glide had no noticeable lag when playing videos.. Features: The Realme feature of connecting and disconnecting using the magnetic buds was awesome, no such feature exists in Glide. The Glide though has a small cover to close the USB charging slot, the Realme has no such cover. The Glide has a BT 5.0, while the others don't, I found the connection strong even with a wall in between. The Dual EQ usage was a bit difficult, simultaneous pressing of the two-volume buttons cumbersome and the Bluetooth kept getting disconnected, also the phone had to be reconnected to the earphone each time the earphone was powered on, this I found to be seamless in Realme. The track change is a long press in the Glide, needs time to get used to this as I ended up increasing the volume several times while changing the track. The Glide is supposed to be splash-proof, though I have not tried this.. Call quality: Realme beats the other two hands down on this. House of Marley was the worst. If one uses the earphone for calling as a primary purpose, the Realme should be a better option.. Looks and Feel: Realme looks premium, followed by the Marley earphone. The Glide has the infinity symbol on the buds flat outer surface, while the Realme does not even sport a logo. I would put Realme on top of the list.. Durability: The House of Marley earphones lasted just about two years, the Realme is about three months old, and going strong, need to see how long the Infinity Glide lasts.. Verdict: If the difference of 500Rs between the Realme and the Glide is not very significant, I would recommend the Realme. But if 500Rs is a big difference, then the Glide is pretty functional, decent sound and comfort, my only concern would be the battery, 5-6 hours is all that I think it could give on first use, while the Realme gave me 8 hours easily on one charge. I guess the disconnect feature while not in use comes in handy for the Realme.

name: Rosy
title: Paves way for euphoria !
content: Best product in this range ...finally bought this after testing all other similar products like : Realme buds, Sony and OnePlus bullets...bcz quality music is all that I craze for!!. name: Pravinraj Seeniraj Nadar
title: Good Sound Quality BT device üòÉ

Also this is my first bluetooth earphones purchased and have used sennheiser wired one before. Now about the earphones. 1- The plastic quality is good,. 2- Sound Quality which is the main highlight is much better in my opinion then my friends boat wireless and I am highly satisfied to use it switching from my wired sennheiser because the sound quality for me is not much different and if its about base then this device is much stronger in deep base mode.. 3- for new users you might feel the volume - button to not feel tacktile compared to Volume+, its because of lower surface area for the Vol- button which is not a problem.. 4 - comes with 1 year warranty and would like to see how long lasting this device would be for me ... 5 - This review I have wrote after using for few minutes of delivery and listening to Li Nas X - Old town Road , Denzel Curry- Ultimate and also will update the review if I find something wrong.

Previously I was using apple airpods which stopped working after 2 years now after that I used multiple Bluetooth earphones Mi, JBL but this is the best surprisingly best over all the earphones I have used in past.. Above mentioned was my review when I purchased this Bluetooth earphones but now since a month the earphones are not working properly. They are getting disconnected with in 5mins when connected to any device. After sale service is pathetic. I‚Äôm struggling to get these set of earphones replaced since last 15 days. I haven‚Äôt received a single positive reply from team Harman nor they are providing me replacement. They have closed my complaint with out proving any solution or replacement.

name: Manish
title: Talking about audio quality.
content: ** I just wanted to save your time so, pubg people & mic quality people this review ain't for you. This review focuses basically on the audio quality part.. So, giving you guys a little background about me, I'm a musician and as you can see in the images I've used two wired headphones alongside this wireless headphone for comparison.. Left - Audio Technica CLR 100BK. Middle - Sennheiser CX 213. Right - Infinity Glide 120. Now I've always chosen Sennheiser basically as they don't color any particular zone of the sonic spectrum; if you're a flat sound lover you basically know what I'm talking about. Also, Audio Technica comes somewhere nearby; just a lil bit of color in the low end to provide that 'oomph' or the thump & subtle reduction of the highs, more of a thumpy festival sound.. Now coming to Infinity, this guy doesn't seem to reproduce the high end at all, don't know if I 'burn-in' these earphones hoping the sound quality will improve a bit.. I basically wanted a wireless upgrade without causing a hole in my pocket for the rest of the month; so gave this a try.. * Well, the extra bass tag is no special, don't be fooled. Low - 10/10. Mids - 9/10. Highs - 5/10. Still testing the battery, will update this review after couple of days.. ** Forgot to update, battery wasn't special too, returned the item. However I'm a happy user of Sony XB-400 now :)

title: Not Recommend # Poor Quality- Disappointed

content: I had to return this product and get a refund for no technical issue but rather callous decisions by JBL over its packaging and its effect on the product ergonomics. I have attached the photos comparing its OEM packaging to another JBL's neckband packaging of exactly the same price available on flipkart.. I had discussed this problem with Amazon & JBL over three days and after JBL's non-support over the issue and failing to provide me with an alternative solution. Amazon helped me get a refund on this product. It is a good thing that I had bought this on Amazon else if I had bought it on JBL's website (where it was cheaper) I would never be able to return the product and would have to accept a defective piece.. If the problems as mentioned in the photos are not an issue for you. This headphone does provide a solid audio experience.

Pros:. 1.quality of earphones is great.product is light weight & looks luxury.. 2.Sound quality is much better than rivals in the market...bass is amazing when you use dual equalizer feature of this earphone.. 3.magnetic back for earphones provide hazel free use.. 4.battery back up was almost 6-7 hrs if we use it with full volume in single charge.. 5.within 2 hrs battery completely charge.. 6. name: Amazon Customer
title: Only Bluetooth Connection problems
content: Only been 3 days since I bought it.. The only problem i am facing is bluetooth connectivity.Whenever I am connecting it with my laptop,the only thing that is connecting is voice.. Let me explain.. Whenever a bluetooth audio device gets connected to my laptop having Windows 10,it shows that the device connected has 2 features,voice and music.When the device connected shows that both music and voice has been connected,it means you can both take calls and listen music.But this device is connecting and the only feature it is showing is voice,which means I can only take calls and can't listen to music.I have to disconnect and reconnect again and again to enable both voice and music. Because much of my work revolves around laptops,this is becoming a hindrance and a nuisance.I hope that that this problem doesn't escalate as the days pass.. Other than Bluetooth connectivity,everything is working fine.Normal vocals,normal bass and treble notes.. A problem I encountered ,which is a bit surprising is that the previous headphone i had was showing a strange problem.When that headphone was connected to my phone,the facebook videos didn't play even after I clicked play.Video statuses on whatsapp also didn't play at all.Mxplayer videos also stopped playing.. Just saying about the different problems i had encountered with headphones.Peace out...:-)

name: reny bhatia
title: Best under 2000 Rs
content: Pros -. Good sound quality.. Listen to music for hours.. Good build. Metallic ear cups. Flexible neck band . Pocket friendly.. 5.0 Bluetooth. Good call quality.. 13 - 15 ft range.. Cons -. Not for sport activities, as it keeps on slipping from the ear. Basically no locking mechanism.. I usually listen to Polk audio.. and have listened to many headphones .. Sound quality is easily the best even when compared with wired earphones under 2000.. Violins ,guitars and background instruments come to life.. Vocals are little recessed , not forward .. Bass is smooth. Not thumping one. It's more musical.. Good imaging and soundstage.. When comparing it with high end headphones ,you will feel it bit muffled.But good part is ,it still goes on and touches little nuances of the song which other earphones clearly miss out on this price bracket.

name: Harpreet Singh
title: Awesome Product
content: "Glide 120 Metal in-Ear Wireless Flexband Earphones, is one of the best Bluetooth headset available in the online market. It has an excellent Bluetooth connectivity and is IPX5 Sweatproof. It is a new addition to the competitor headsets since 2019, December. It uses the latest technology and features for giving a premium audio experience to the users. It is a hot-selling product on Amazon with a high rating.. It has a Dual equalizer feature which helps the users switch between normal to the bass mode of music as per your mood. You can use the volume buttons on the remote to reduce or increase the bass. It is a very amazing technology embedded on to the Glide 120. The latest Bluetooth chipset gives better connectivity with the device without any barrier interruption in music. The metal earbuds give a sturdy feel and sits tight in the ears. I go jogging every morning and the Glide 120 is super comfy and user friendly. Adding to this, the battery life is my main concern while choosing wireless earphones. The Glide 120 provides amazing battery life with a less charging time. All good things in one package!. Another feather is the hands free calling feature on the remote of this headset. Once you connect your phone with Glide 120, you need not take out your phone again for receiving your calls at least. Pick up or cut the call from the remote of the headset itself. Coming to the remote, three buttons on it are used for operating many functions. The functions of these buttons are receiving and disconnecting calls, changing tracks, forward or reverse the music track increase & decrease volume and play & pause. Not only that, but it also supports Google Assistant from your device. Now, you do not need to unplug your Glide 120 to speak to your virtual assistant. So, do not waste much time. If you are a music lover, then go for the Glide 120 today and place your order right away."

This one from JBL is just at 10% of the cost of bose so I feel this is good at the price. No noise cancellation are there and neither there is an app for this earphone.. Final verdict - Good to use with mobile phones and not for office calls on laptop like cisco webex or teams.

I am ready to pay extra money for another good earphone. But unfortunately amazon is not giving that option... ‚òπ

content: Impressed with the JBL N120. The sound was quiet loud. The sound output was very good along with decent bass. Had bought Realme buds air for 4k and had to return it since it was not good for calls. Had done enough research on glide N120, boat 255, Realme buds wireless, Skullcandy inkd, Samsung level u, boult neckband etc.. +ve. Build is very good even though it‚Äôs plastic except for earbuds which has metal in it.. You get a voice over for every operation that you do like switch on/off pairing on/off, bass mode etc which is very helpful. Sound output in terms of volume is quiet loud. The Bass is also good and this is very relative as to how much one would like to have.. The neckband as such is get flexible unlike others as you can easily wrap them and carry along. Call quality over mic was good as well. If you want your earphones to be out of the world for calls during all noisy scenarios then you have to go for active noise cancellation only which will cost you more than 10k.. I am yet to test the battery life but it took not more than 1.5 hours to fully charge.. I am using it with iPhone so no issues on connectivity with iOS as well. Long press on the power button automatically calls the last dialled number.

What could be difference if using same technology in same model.

When connected to phone via BT & receiving calls from headphone on/off button the calls get rejected. Try receiving calls from phone screen, the headphone BT itself gets disconnected from phone.. Product quality 2 stars. Product make is nowhere even close to othe Harman/JBL produsts i have used before & looks cheap.. Overall Rating (can be given) 1 star

name: Disha G.
title: Detailed Review:
content: Pros -. Bass : 10/10. Music Quality : 10/10. Comfort and fit : 9/10. Battery : 9/10. Range : 9/10. Gaming (PubG) : 10/10 (No lag). Bass is exceptionally good.. Cons-. Wires bent in a specific way due to packaging causing the earphones to loosen out of one ear after sometime.. Wire drops to one side of neck due to the packaging. Should straighten out after a few days.. Playback button features (skip song/ Siri) different from from normal headphones like holding down the volume button to move between tracks.. Design is old compared to what‚Äôs trending in the market.

name: Avishek Chatterjee

I have connected to my laptop & mobile tried online video calling and normal phone calls. Every time, I had a bad feedback from the other person on the call.

title: Disappointed.
content: I was very excited about this, Because Harman International is very well known brand in world of Accoustic. Bought it for Rs 1199/- Got today. Here some pros and cons of this device.. Pros:. ‚óè Good build quality.. ‚óè IPX5, splash proof. Not water proof.. ‚óè Comfortable.. ‚óè Fit to ear.. ‚óè Decent battery back up.. ‚óè tangle free cable.. ‚óè easy to carry.. ‚óè very lightweight.. ‚óè flexible.. ‚óè No issues while calling.. ‚óè Noise cancellation works well.. Cons:. ‚óÜ Sound quality average. Lack of details. In high volume it just makes noise. Excessive bass just ruin the music. In 50% volume, it is somehow tolerable.. ‚óÜ In Deep bass, music got muffled due to excessive bass. Bass quality is not up to the mark. Deep bass somewhat Ok with low volume. In high volume, it just terrible. Prefer to use normal mode.. ‚óÜ Switch normal mode to deep bass mode was quite dificult. I struggled many time to switch between normal mode and deep bass mode. Too long press device got disconnected. Just press + and - simultaneously then lift.. ‚óÜ Connectivity not good as infinity bt speaker.. ‚ñ† Overall, if you brand conscious, bassheaded and want a stylish, light weight, splash proof wireless headset under Rs 1.5K then it would be your cup of tea. I was very excited about it before using, but after using it continuously 2 hours I was disappointed. I expected, it would be produce balanced and descent sound like JBL C50HI, Realme buds 2 or Redmi basic earphone. But It disappoint me.. My rating for this device is: 2.8 out of 5

name: Anand
title: Great battery backup and very good sound.
content: The first and foremost fbi g that I want to call out is that today (Saturday Dec 12 happens to be the 12th day of usage (average usage of 30-35 minutes per day in the gym listening to music only) and thr battery is still going strong. I have still not unwrapped the charger cable Or charged it. Simply started using it out of the box from day 1. In my books THAT is a huge plus for any brand.. Prior to this one I was using MIVI Beats for close to three years and it died a natural and logical death last month.. Other good things about this:. 1. Extremely light weight - I don‚Äôt feel like I am wearing them and no discomfort for upto 35 minutes of wearing. Honestly I have never used it any longer so I wouldn‚Äôt know.. 2. Snug fit. I am extremely picky about in ear headphones because 90% of them keep falling off my ears even with the slightest movement (including the mighty Apple headphones). I have oddly big years and I require silicon stubs to to hold the headphones in place. The ones in these headphones are both soft and sturdy. And the headphones NEVER fall off my ears during my workout.. 3. Sound quality is pretty much on par with other headphones and I will admit it is on the good side. I usually don‚Äôt play music at full volume so I don‚Äôt know if the sound cracks at high volume. Bass is quite good.. Some stuff that I personally don‚Äôt like.. 1. The overall design is not all that attractive. I feel the length of the wires could have been a little shorter.. 2. The control stub and its identical twin on the left side. While they look ugly I guess they house the power pack for the long battery life.. Overall I think this is great value for money. I have no hesitation recommending this.

name: shaktiki sharma
title: Waste
content: Built quality ok, except the in-ear tips every thing plastic. The neck band is flexi and just thicker than rest of the wire, so can be folded and kept in pocket (see image). The sound is ok. Highs are good, mods are ok, lows not so much. Bass is good. Look and packaging is ok. Durability can't aay cause i just got it. Lets see.... Updating after about one month use. Neither the microphone nor the earpiece working. This is despite no tugging or harm to the product. Waste of money.

name: Pavithran G
title: Get a load of this
content: Circuits made in one of our neighbours on this product arbitrarily jacks up the volume to max on connecting to an Apple iPad irrespective of last stored volume every single time. So once you connect to iPad you should do an extra step to reduce the volume immediately or risk blasting high volume noise into your ears. Every. Single. Time. I have attached a representative screen recording of this happening in real time.. What‚Äôs even more malicious is that the earphones mess with radio streams constantly by randomly pausing and playing the streams on iPad.. Both behaviours are unique to how this earphones behaves with an iPad and no such issues were noticed while connecting to android devices that I had.. Sound quality is average with hardly any highs or clarity and high bass but I guess that‚Äôs related to the price and nothing suspect on that count.. I don‚Äôt understand American companies still producing electronics in one of our neighbours with long soured relations. Overall very disappointing experience. Not to be used with an iPad.. 23rd day update: Totally dead. Seems inferior and compromised pieces are targeted at inconvenient individuals with precision.. 1.5 month update: after unsuccessfully arguing with JBL to deliver a replacement to my home they directed me to a service center where within minutes a replacement was issued hassle free with minimum computer work. Was pleased with process and customer service execs on phone were helpful as well. Replacement also messes with iPad internet radio streams and jacks up volume on connection! But quality of music on the earphones has grown on me since and I would classify it as above average. Big bass does compensate for other shortcomings. Worth noting JBL aka infinity aka Harman is a Samsung company.

name: Arun
title: Value for money only for music not for call
content: Updating review : the music quality is good , but call quality is bad. I always hearing some kind of disturbance noise while talking on phone calls which I do not hear with other headset or direct phone ear speaker. I can hear bass only in the deep bass mode and it is good, not very deep bass which will disturb the mid and high frequencies. Deep bass mode is perfect for me and normal mode is simply waste because it doesn't feel good. The noise while talking on phone is a real disturbance if we conectarte keenly but it's OK that i can say thinking about the music quality it gives. Let's see the how long it last. And one more thing on the ear bud its broken while replacing, i did replaced with care though.. Old : This is a great product for the price ! I was hesitant to buy this product because of the negative reviews, that is because I used samsung level u (good but that was 2.5K), jbl worth 750rs(i didn't like), and using AKG (around 7K in market) that i got with my samsung phone. And i know that no headset will match my AKG headset under this price range, so I placed the order.. My initial impression about the quality is great, listened to many songs and i really liked the sound quality, it has good bass , mid is not that great with default equalizer setting but I know how to tweak it, so I feel it's a great product for the price. And noise cancellation while talking over phone call is fine for the price, i know i cannot get pure noise cancellation that price is above 10K. Overall its a value for money product, I'll definitely recommend

name: Grishma Shrishrimal
title: This took me back to 80s where the background noise was normal
content: I would recommend this product only to someone who has never used a handsfree. If you have used any basic handsfree earlier you would not be able to appreciate this. There's so much background noise like the classic "khrkhrkhrkhr" sound that makes you feel like you're in the 80s. Bluetooth hearing while on a video call is of low quality and the sound is very unclear and would want you to go off bluetooth and just talk on speaker. This is only good for music. Otherwise the sound quality during phone calls, other online calls and video calls will make you want to regret connecting the handsfree altogether. Do yourself a favour, and if you want a good Bluetooth handsfree for calling and video calls search for more options.

name: R.Rajesh
title: Bass and Bass only , lags in Clarity and sharpness unless you have tuned with equalizer
content: Its light weight, the name we trust looks wise decent, as mentioned 12mm drives gives the maximum bass, Here my suggestion for you is if you have a mobile with inbuilt equalizer for Bluetooth headset adjustments ..then pretty well you can manage this headset, else if you play directly you can just hear your music with Bass , Bass nd Bass only...there won't be clarity in ups and downs..something like an amplifier connected to a lower decibels speaker...in that way iam disappointed with this...I don't know why they made like this if they are not able to render a clarity of sharpness in mids..simply its something like a stereo functioning with a mono inbuilt mids for voice amplification...so we need to suppress the Bass a little bit and increase the sharpness in equalizer...There is no Return policy simply you can replace if you feel bad with something but there won't be any reason other than I experienced you can find to replace...About fitting in ears its stays well, light weight. But one best thing you can feel is if at all you want to hear songs while riding with this headset you can feel the Bass even at lower decibels...So those who bought don't think bad about your purchase just adjust your equalizer settings...others if you are just a Bass lover, and needs a Bassy surround....you can go for this...Hope I have given my opinion to the fullest...

name: ANUPAM
title: Pros cons and final verdict !!
content: I got it for 890 , these headphones come in 2 pre loaded equaliser modes , so when i took it out of the box and tried it , I regretted that i got these . Because the base was so over powered it ruined the vocals , but after a few days by chance I downloaded its instruction manual online and read that if we press + and - buttons for a while it switches to normal equaliser , i did that and i was so surprised!! It sounded exactly how i wanted them. Now talking about pros and cons.. PROS :. 1. Price at which i got these was 849 , i couldn‚Äôt find any other earphones of any brand with neck band wireless tech at this price , as these are usually compared to earphones worth double this price. 2. Built quality is very very good , thick wires , metal on earbuds. 3. Connectivity is good , i have used with android as well as iOS it works totally fine. 4. Music quality : they will surprise you . Thumping bass clear vocals , just adjust your equaliser to your favourite settings .. Cons :. Eartips should be more rubbery , it isn‚Äôt exactly slippery but yeah i found that if you have any-other good quality tips you can use them. Also . Its control are bit different so please read the manual first .. Final verdict : go for it . Even at 1000 they are worth money .

name: Bhumika
title: No noise cancellation and poor design. High bass and great mic experience
content: So the features you need in a bluetooth earphone are all great like sound quality, battery, bass, mic, however, did not find the 'flexible' neckband design appealing. The neck band is not even slightly firm, hence it tends to slip down from my mum's hair unlike boult audio (whose design is robust and does not keep slipping from neck, but bass and mic are poor. It's neckband is very soft and does not hurt while jogging or travelling lol. Infact it never slips, hence fear of losing it while sleeping is minimum). So 1 star deducted because of that. Also, poor noise cancellation in jbl bluetooth earphones and buds. They are too sensitive to pick lot of background noises and hence disturb the calling experience. I like the earphones but could have been better.....

name: Hemant Redkar
title: Worst Bluetooth Headset
content: The biggest issue with this product is it's performance. Sound, Bass all good but there is huge difference in timing when it's connected. You hear the voice about 3 seconds late. Seriously this issue started after using for 7days. Product frequently disconnects. Again if it's still connected you can't listen to anything but it will show that it's connected and your songs and call will run on you phone without any sound. You have to restart the headset to get connected and be able to hear audio again. Very Disappointed as I had purchased this after my JBL Endurance stopped working. Also to add on Looks like cheap plastic body. Purely looks like the cheap Bluetooth devices found under 300. Wouldn't suggest anyone to waste their money over this. Better add in a few extra bucks and take something else. Really Surprised how people are giving 5 star ratings perhaps they don't actually know about headphones much or are just faking it.

name: R. vinod
title: Honestly not worthy
content: Guys I am just giving this reveiw after testing the BH in my iphone ,laptop, android phone.. It has two modes normal and dbass. We will never use normal because it's very normal like a local headphones.. I bought it at 899. Dbass is ok not so great. Tried with full volume in iphone it's really annoying. It will damage your ear if you keep. I used all top brands heaphone like apple sony OnePlus bullet etc. This is not a worthy for long hours ..... disappointed actually.. I listen üëÇ to all types of songs from English Tamil hindi telugu...punjabi... If you listen to old songs it will be worse like anything.. But people who use it for calls and audio video classes this is best at this price.. It will connect to multiple devices but it take bit long time like 1 - 2 min to automatically connect.. Sometimes I feel the bass isn't working even I listen to latest song with high quality.. Battery is good, 7 hours as promised it will stay awake. I like it. If you listen in low volume your ears are safe.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Average Product
content: This is an average product.. Sound quality during phone calls are bad. The voice is not that sharp enough , kind of muddy.. It doesn't have auto disconnect, if you happen to connect and keep it on at night, by morning you will see 40-50% battery drain.. It can connect to two devices at a time, that is nice feature.. There was some auto disconnect and reconnect between long usage say 1 hour calls or music, which is a little irritating.

name: BigBen
title: Waste of time and money
content: Horrible. Just got it. Now trying to return it as the sound is just awful. Really flat. You don‚Äôt get the battery level on the phone as well. Totally disappointed.. Not sure how the others are ok with this product. I had a boat Bluetooth earphones before this and can vouch that the sound from the boat earphones was leagues ahead of this one.

name: A_Logical_Indian
title: Not reliable
content: Bought for 999/- during prime sale. Battery backup was as advertised. Bass was decent if not outstanding. Does support multiple device connect. Comes in a not so good packaging.. Now Cons-. Only works effectively with Android devices.. Doesn't work with iphone. Connection keep on dropping very often.. Range is too bad.. Doesn't even work with Windows10.. Replaced twice but both of the unit has same issues. So looks like this model itself has these issues in general.

name: Vikas Pande
title: Great product for the price range.
content: Okay, so it‚Äôs a good review. Battery is claimed around 7 hours but it‚Äôs actually pretty decent unless you are a heavy user.. Build is plastic but is durable.. Sound quality is good. The deep bass actually has effect and the music is good.. Connectivity is a bit slow as after turning on it takes around 10 seconds to connect to my phone.. According to price that is, 1200 rs it‚Äôs really good.. Charging time is a bit slow but manageable.. Overall 4/5

name: Mohammed S.
title: Recommended
content: Couldn't ask for more in this price range got it for 899/-. Sound quality for both call and music is pretty loud and clear... It'll take few minutes to get used to the ear pieces. But sure its gonna be lil uncomfortable for few people while wearing them for longer periods. Overall good experience... Should wait and check the durability of this pair

name: Venkat krishna
title: Mindblowing performance..thanks harman.
content: It's really amazing, furst of all i want to tell one thing about this product, when i was used sony ericsson mobile in 2011 i was enjoyed a lot about the music experience but after that i was tried too many brands like akg,philips,jbl and sony but i didn't get much satisfaction and now harman glide 120 remembers that experience, why because vocal sounds,bass,and background music every thing clear finally value for the product about this price range,fully satisfied..üòçüòçüòç

name: Prince
title: Audio smooth but length is longer. Charging point is normal USB not Type-C
content: Sound quality is good, but the length of wire is bit more. I think that makes it uncomfortable, should be smaller length.. About magnetic controls, the product which I recieved was not having magnetic on/off although it has magnetic feature to join. I just raised a complaint let's see if replaced product will have magnetic on/off.. Audio quality is clear and pairing speed is also good. 12mm drivers as mentioned in product. It should be noted that charging point is not Type-C.. Box included 1 USB, 1 Earphone and 2 buds.. Could have been a little better at this price point.. Addition - I recieved defected product twice from amazon.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good product
content: The Glide 120 consists of 12mm drivers that ensure the sound quality and provides you with ultimate stereo brilliance. I wear my neckband at all times. Definitely comfortable and great sound quality. This product provides better bass, smooth treble, and pure audio with high and low identification. Sometimes, you may also enjoy surround sound in it. Therefore it is the best product for the collar headphone lovers who wish to enjoy soothing music while on the go.

name: Jesse Daniel Antony
title: Simply the best in this price segment and a few segments above!
content: I have no idea why there are so many negative reviews for this one. I think these are truly amazing in this price segment and a few segments above as well. They sound unbelievably good for this price! Build quality is too good! Amazing bass! If you find the bass over powering, you can always switch to normal mode.. And DO remember to choose the right ear plug size - it makes a world of difference in the sound quality. You need to get a perfect air tight seal.

name: Shashi Bhushan
title: DAMN! IT'S WORTHY!
content: I purchased this Infinity by Harman Glide 120 neckband during the Diwali Sale, got it for just ‚Çπ799 with a sweet sweet discount. Coming from Apple Airpods 2, this was a pleasant surprise! Holy crap these sound amazing for the price I paid. Personally, I'm a basshead and OMG I literally cried out of joy for what my ears were listening to after a long while of using much balanced sounding Airpods! This little MF at 800 bucks gave me what I was serching for so long. The vocals, lows, mids, bass everything is a joy to listen. Especially the bass and lows. Brilliant. I switched from Airpods cz of the unintentional sensor activities while I would lie down or hit the gym, it's just irritating. So Indecided to go for something with tactile feedback inputs rather than touch controls. This neckband is probably the best "my kinda music" delivering pair of earphones I've ever came across lately. Battery backup is decent, my only gripe is a type-C input to juice it up. Gives me around 4 to 5 hours of straight on sessions at around 75% volume (honestly you don't wanna go anything above that on these, they are insane!) Obviously I miss out on the charging case convenience on-the-go but I carry my Airpods anyways for "occasional" outdoor use. For intense listening with great sound, THIS IS IT!. The only reason I gave it a 4 stars is, as soon as I got the product, I scanned the QR to register it on Harman Audio India website for warranty, but the product is listed on Harman's website for sale, but not to register! Strange! So after hours of googling and searching, I gave up the idea to register it taking a risk, but except for the risk factor of any unpredictable damage recently, this neckband is just worth every penny for bassheads. Nothing beats it.

name: Priyanka
title: Overall nice so far
content: Sound quality is good. Noise cancellation is good. Bass quality is super good. And compatible with all mobile phone. I use it with iph, Mi and oppo and it works well. And it gets charge super quick not like other one I bought from JBL. Earlier I bought JBL endurance run BT sweatproof and JBL tune 205BT wireless headphone but both are little lesser than infinity one and they both are of more price than this. I don't like much earbuds other than which apple provide but this is one is really good. The only bad option JBL has that they don't have any service center near by to get it checked if there is any fault. Product has warranty or not but if it is repairable than what's a harm in it. JBL endurance stopped working at it come up with battery issue that it's not getting charged even after putting it on charge for two hours. It's been one year in the month of OCTOBER 2020 let see how battery works for this one

name: Abhijith ajithkumar
title: Prioduct is ok, but too many bugs....
content: 1.After the headphone is connected, still the phone earpiece is working for calls(unable to use for calling) tested in vivo z1 pro and samsung A50s. Both phones are showing the same bug.. 2. After cutting the call, the media play back is disorted (like mono audio).. 3. Battery backup is not great, but ok.. 4.audio breaks continiously while mobile hotspot is ON.. Updated(24/03/21)

name: Manish Kumar Gupta
title: Good for music but not for calls
content: Good for listening music but not for attending calls. Mic is not up to mark. I was using Boat Rockerz headset before this and that was better than this. Not compatible with Windows 10 PC. I am struggling to get the connection each I try with PC. Such products are not expected from renowned brands like Harman and JBL.

name: JayEssBee
title: Bluetooth ear phones .. Infinity Glide 120 (JBL)
content: In ear fitting is excellent . Noise cancellation feature as such is not there but due to in ear perfect fitting of these earphones you can barely listen to outside noise (medium listening level,). Bass response is very good and through phone equaliser one can further improve it.. In built battery is okay but not so good because on full charge it can give four hours playback only.. Bluetooth connectivity and range are good, it's keypad is multi functional and us very useful.. In all one can simply go for it ...

name: B K Chetan Kumar
title: SImply Suberp.. Customer Centric
content: i purchased this product on jan 2020.. i am writing a review after 5-6 months.. basically i 'm rough user.. i use this earphones all d occasions.. even after 6 months, it s stills d same, no complaint, same performance, water resistant etc... Ignore negative reviews about bass and Sound quality.. Infinity Glade 120 aswell as Glade 500 are just amazing... and i am music lover.. i used to test all d products. This is my 4th Bluetooth neckband, I own boat rockerz series of 2 earphone & 2 headphone, boult 1 earphone and airpod, finally infinity Glade 120 and Glade 500.. to be frank, never ever i thought infinity products will b customer centric products.. compare to above, infinity stands higher thn all bcz of its build quality, noise cancellation, bass effect and etc... 98% satisfactions .. rest 2% lags in battery. Bass - 9/10. noise cancellation - 9/10. Connectivity - 10/10. Build Quality - 10/10. Battery - 7/10 (in negative concern). overall superb.. THanks Harman... and Infinity

name: Himanshu thakur
title: dnt buy for 1299 ...! plz read if you r buying.
content: well i got it replace for the first time when i got it . It doesnt look so special for the first look but i kept it .. when i started using it , it shows its real face .it automaticallly connect with other previous devices and lag in sound video was moving forward and audio was late syn to listen bass is okay not too good battery is okay dnt acpt much.. All i want to say DNT BUY FOR 1299 its not worth . I made a mistake you dnt.. well the only thing here good is ---------------when u r wearing this while riding scooty bike it has less probabilty of falling then wireless earbuds from speedy wind only thats a advantage and beware they can also send used product all i want to say dnt buy for 1299 its not worth it plzz dnt make mistake like me .its worth 999 thats what i think.. i hope this coment help anyone of you. overall okay for 899 to 999. but not for 1299. see more.

name: sandeep
title: Ignore the negative reviews.
content: Sound quality: Highs and lows are perfect. Significant boost in bass in ‚Äúdeep bass‚Äù mode compared to the normal mode.. I paid 10 times more for ‚Äúbose soundsport free‚Äù but this product sounds as good as bose ( in deep bass mode). And ya the music doesnt stop when the magnets are attached. But it shouldnt matter. If u are worried about the battery draining hold the play button for 5 secs to turn it off.. One thing i noticed, when the battery is low the tempo of the song reduces. Its actually Weird.. Otherwise its good in every aspect. Nothing to complain about.. Yet to check the water resistance and longevity.. Bottomline : You Wont get a better one in this price range ...! GO FOR IT

name: Neha
title: Very poor sound quality, good for calls with really good battery.
content: Well i have beeb using these headphones for my office calls and not for music.. When it comes to music, the headphones are very bad, the clarity is poor and so is the base.. Also the make looks quite poor. Besides its also made in china so thats another -1. However it's great for calls and the battery easily lasts a day and a half. Also i attend many calls so the battery is indeed very good.. Am using it only cos it comes with a one year warranty.. Besides that i cant believe that its a jbl product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Average Product !
content: Pros:. 1) Good bass and sound quality probably because it is manufactured by Harman. 2) Work comfortably with 2 device (Mobile, Laptop) at a time , the moment you pause or stop from 1 device you can listen from another device. Cons:. 1) Mic doesn't work , if you want to attend calls using this, you won't be able to. 2) No proper neck band , so it's very difficult to listen while doing something standing or just simply walking , you definitely can not run unless you tangle it somehow. 3) No return policy , it can only be replaced otherwise I would have returned and bought some other headphone

name: Alok Yenpure
title: Deep bass... Not actually.
content: Infinity (JBL) Glide 120 metal in ear.... I purchased it along with Maono AU-D30. Got delivered both on next day. Plastic quality is very cheap. Takes longer than Maono to power on also takes much time to connect. Sound quality is good. But bass lover stay away. If you like to listen bass, then go for Maono. Infinity has 2 settings:- one is Normal and the other one is Deep bass. When you switch over to deep bass you won't feel any huge difference actually. It is just like thump becomes loud at the same volume, that's it. Its is not like Heavy or Explosive as older JBL in-ear earphones used to have or Maono AU-D30 has.

name: Sumit (IIM R)
title: Ghatiya Product | For JBL fans, infinity is not a product u sud own
content: If you are spending this much bucks, use it to buy other branded headset. This product really sucks. My earlier stint with JBL headphones has been amazing but this infinity product by harman disappointed me a lot though I can understand that this is an average product launched by them to target customer who does not like to spend too much on earpeices. Beleive me, try aome other brand, this is not a quality product. Battery backup also sucks like anything. I am a JBL/HK fan and my expectation from this brand was really compromised after buying this cheap product. Anyways, I went to buy this product after reading a lot of reviews here and found that they were talking about deep bass, I think those people haven't experienced good bass and therefore any bass is a good bass to them. This product sucks in simple language. If you want to buy, you r still open to consider this product.

name: Chitransh Saxena
title: Warranty registration process.
content: They are pretty good. But one thing i concerned about. Is that when i going through a warranty registration there is no product like infinty 120.....only infinity glide 100 or more but. No infinity glide 120..... So i havee to write it manually by name. Or invoice no. And all in there manually warranty registration process...

name: Bhairo singh
title: Better than boat255 and realme buds
content: Amazing product by the Harman. It's better than realme Buds or boat 255 in terms of sound quality, bass is punchy and sound is crystal clear.. Who wants punchy bass and clear sound Go for this without any thought. Looks are pretty good. Wires are durable.. After using eight month :-. The earphones right side speaker was stop. I reached the Harman service centre. Just after 10 days they replace the my earphones, and provide me a brand new earphone. Really nice service support by harman,

name: Mahendra
title: Good but not for pubg
content: Sound quality is good bass is good but some treble is missing and this earphone is not suitable for pubg mobile because while you are playing pubg the voice is comes after some sec

name: Sarif Sheikh
title: Go ahead have it
content: So The Product is very beautifully delivered to us. Packing perspective is average.. But Sound is Beautiful and Kind of bass Head heavy. They is good Emphasis on the Bass of this üëÇ phone. Talking about the overall Sound it quite decent. And Above Average quality kind of 7.8/10. Conclusion:. If you want a 1200rs earphone for Excessive bass. And Good vocals then Definitely , recommended for. You as it Brand Is JBL. JBL : A good and Old brand which is trustworthy to it's products.

name: Arun Ambar
title: Good headphone within this price range
content: The sound quality is good and extra bass effect is an added feature. Battery back up is also reasonable. However, if you are buying it for your jogging/running purposes, please think again. The band is too light and keeps slipping from shoulder and it is quite annoying to adjust it often. Bluetooth range is quite good and the call feature is also up to the mark. Backward compatibility with lower version of bluetooth appliances is decent and there is no disturbance.

name: Swapnil Sen Pandey
title: Not so polished product.
content: I purchased this product considering its a Harman brand. So my expectations for sound quality was some what high but I'm disappointed. Bass is full and pronounced, mid are okay and highs are simply missing and muffled. Moreover I don't feel it's a polished product. Specs on paper are very good like bluetooth 5.0 and IPX rating but using product is a different experience. Bluetooth takes more than 3 seconds to connect everytime. It is impossible to turn on bass mode by holding volume up and volume down button, all it does is disconnect from the device. And if you don't hold power off button for 5 seconds and leave it in 4 or 4.5 seconds it will call the most recent dialled number. Overall I want to say I'm not happy with this porduct but I'm still giving it a 3 rating for the amount of base it provide. If all you care about is base you can buy it.

name: Ignatius Nayan D'Rozario
title: Well balanced sound signature
content: The 2 audio profiles are good for people like me who listen to a range of music.. The audio is balanced with proper equalisation for the mid levels.. The bass is not too overt. Which means that one can still hear true lyrics for Rock, R&B, ballads etc.. The 120 has a flexible neck piece. This is good if you want to fold it away.. Not so good if you are moving and speaking on the phone and it decides to slide away with the mic that's on the right. The N120 will be better for this use case.

name: Digvijay Patel
title: Dude, Bass is on another level and Dual Equalizer is to die for!!!
content: Bought it Just few days back and since then I've been mesmerized by the quality of sound offered by Infinity Glide 120.. I wanted to state that the battery life is upto 7 hours with casual usage. In this price range JBL & Harman teamed up to deliver a premium product.. Warranty offered is 1 whole year, isn't it wonderful.. I loved the way their Support Team responded about warranty info.

name: Aniket Borkar
title: Clear sound during call and awesome quality music
content: Awesome product. I have used boat before but this product clearly outclass it.. Sound quality is excellent for receiver. The other person will not even notice if you are on headset mode while talking.. Also, while listening songs your will enjoy it.. Very quickly it connects to your phone which I like the most about this product.. Battery back up is excellent.

name: Palaniappan
title: If you can afford it, then go for it!!!!!! No second thought!!
content: Details :. I ordered this earphone on 21-10-2020. The item was delivered on 22-10-2020. Color - yellow and black. My review :. This is the best earphone under rs.1500. I bought this on amazon great indian festival sale @Rs. 899 and reviewing it after one day of continuous use.. Sound quality : decent. Bass: it has two modes normal mode and.. Deep bass mode. At Normal mode the bass is pretty decent but for high bass songs it is not so good as you cannot hear the song properly as you hear some disturbances!!!!. But when we activate deep bass mode the bass quality is awesome better than any other popular company earphones like boat, realmi, etc the deep bass is really fabulous and you can hear the songs that you love for hours!!!!!!!!. Noise cancellation : In such earphones you cannot expect a good noise cancellation but there is noise isolation hence this doesn't bother much!!!!. Comfort: The earphone is very comfortable as in the design itself you can see that there is a ear hook like thing which is extended from the earphones that makes it a perfect fit for ear! Personally i have a small earhole but this earphone fits me well only because of its design not because of the earbuds!!!. Connectivity : connectivity is extraordinary!!!. Once paired with two devices then it can switch between them so easily !!! It has Bluetooth 5.0 hence no issue with connectivity. Features : 1.normal and deep bass mode. 2.comfortable design. 3.Smart connectivity. 4.Easy controls. 5.Good battery life (7 hours)

name: Dr Shailesh
title: Worst and hopless earphone
content: Plz dont buy this earphone..1st of all its bluetooth connectivity it shows its connected but no voice or ring can be hear in earphone..when we bring close both buds its not getting off only magnetic power is there..3rd most important is battery back up is very 3rd class when we connect charger after some time its shows 100% and after some time its goes 60..30..10.. its buds given harm when long time used...and its not jbl...so guys dont waste ur money...go with branded and trusfull earphones..

name: Xav
title: Just like Sony Ericsson Walkman Series in 2006
content: Trust me guys I am in the field of music past 30 years and the quality I heard with Infinity Glide 120 is equally the same effect I last heard with the Sony Ericsson walk man series mobile back in 2006. Please learn to adjust the mobile equaliser so you don't get a headache due to the thump deep bass. Secondly, please be very carefull for people who plug this on your ear while you drive or ride in a car or motorbike as you really won't be able to hear if anyone honks or stands near by and speaks to you. You will be absolutely in music world and might get into seriously road incidents if you are not mindful during traffic conditions.. I must take the liberty to say don't waste much money with Bose or other brands as the quality you get with Infintiy is truly awersome and you will never regret. Soft volumes during nights is suggested. Please go ahead and buy. Enjoy th music times and be safe when you travel.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Do not buy and waste money
content: After using for 15days I'm reviewing the product, Do not waste your money on this product. It is pathetic when you talk on call, there is no noise cancellations, also it is not good to use while you r jogging it will just keep jumping on ur neck as the wire is too flexible, battery will last for 3 hrs if used continuously. Sound quality is okay too much of bass which is not necessary at all. Dont fall for branded name of jbl it's not worth. There is no auto bluetooth connect and auto off which indeed drains ur battry of handset aswel of the buds, it hardly keeps u connected to ur fone if u move far from your mobile more than 20meters.. Not worth at all

name: Debajyoti C.
title: Best value for money
content: Sound, Call quality, and deep bass,,, all top notch for the price paid. Battery backup, fully satisfactory. I charge once in every 2nd day. Charging time is also less.. Only con is the neck band is too slim to hold it at a place over your neck, it keeps on sliding. Very important to check if magnetic lock is secured if you are not using this. I am using my old sony clip with one of the wires to secure it with my shirt collar.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good at the price paid, but when compared with competitors it may lose.
content: I have used it for a week now, the deep base mode is good, I have personally felt that one side is less effective as left side sounds a little bit slow, I mean it is noticeable that both the sides are not equal. But yes in this price this is the best quality earphones. My review on the beach band is that, it is comfortable to carry as it is wire only, but the problem is it is unable to hold the side bars steadily because of their weight, every time you put one side one the other side keep going on down side and the mic is below your chest, and the person on the other side can't hear you. Also if the mic is little bit far from where it should be, it doesn't catch your voice, so this is the major problem I am facing.

name: Sourav S.
title: Perfect for the price point.
content: Sound - Good sound for the price you‚Äôre paying.. Highs and bass are more prominent.. The super bass mode works well.. I use it with iphone and it works fine.. The pairing is a little slow.. It takes around 5secs to automatically pair with the device.. The buttons are nice and tactile.. Battery life is decent.. The low battery alert comes very late, and the device switches of within 20mins of low battery alert.. I used it in rain, is working fine till now. Seems to be water resistant.

name: GSRPK
title: Better Than Highly Priced JBL
content: Received the item on time. I got product which is already used. There are 2 stickers on the outer side of the box at the opening. That means already someone opened the box with knife and again placed one more sticker on it.. I opened the box with little hesitation as it already used by someone. Box is loaded with all the items which mentioned by the company.. Tested the sound quality. Guess what...... The sound quality made me forget all the things. I am a music lover and bass lover. The bass mode in this simply magic. I checked with JBL Bluetooth with my friend. I honestly felt far better than those headsets as they are priced higher side. Big 5 stars for sound quality. I bought this mainly for music purpose so I am very much satisfied. Calls wise also I didn‚Äôt find any problem so far. I bought it on 6th delivered on 7th and today 13th Aug. So now I am going for regester online for warranty.. Definitely it is worth money.

name: Shelley S.
title: Amazing Sound
content: It has great sound considering the price. These earphones have got two EQ modes, normal and deep base. And I would say deep base mode justifies its name. I am also impressed with the mic performance, I can take calls easily, no complaints from the caller side as well.. The battery backup is about 7 hrs, and it takes 1.5 - 2 hrs to charge completely. Company doesn't provide any charger, one can use any micro USB charger where output is not greater than 5 v and 1.2 A as per user manual.. I cant' exactly give the Bluetooth range, but works fine if I stay in the same room.. Overall build quality is also nice, this has soft neck band, one can easily fold it and keep it in pocket. This is what differentiates it from N120 variant.

name: Daanish
title: High Bass but Low Battery
content: Been using it for 3 days.. The product is real Harman (checked on their website and called the call center too to confirm), quality is decent.. The bass is really good and hits you really hard at max volume.. The only drawback is the battery which drained out in 3-4 hour usage, the battery indicator is faulty as it will show battery low at 50%.

name: PALASH GHANSHAM BHURE
title: Order reached but product wasn't there inside the box
content: I had no chance to test how they sound. The Bluetooth earphone wasn't there inside the box, just usb charging cable and earbuds.. I didn't expect this from the retailer, or whose fault was that. But i thought because of JBL it's quality must have been good

name: Anno
title: Perfect blend of music
content: Sound significantly well and especially vocal and instrument separation, surpassed my expectations. So called audiophile spent thousands to satisfy their thrust, infinity pack's up with a performance which ensure stability and balance of audio separation. Those who spent their time to complaint about it, let me remind that its a in house brand of jbl. So quality is not at all compromised, I will update

name: Kale salad
title: Totally worth the money
content: I switched from Apple AirPods to these.... And I must say, I don‚Äôt feel any drastic difference in the sound quality. It is slightly flat compared to the AirPods, but I don‚Äôt mind it, the bass is quite nice.. The mic is not the best, especially when connected to a laptop (Mac; haven‚Äôt connected it to a PC yet), so I wouldn‚Äôt recommend these if your main objective is Zoom and Team meetings. The Bluetooth range is not very wide (about 10 feet or so), but it is fine by me.... I got them mainly for audiobooks, lectures, binaural-beats and some regular music. In that they are awesome...

name: Maddy
title: Use and throw products...
content: Product's ra good... But after sale service worst then local products. Boat is far better, in terms of after sales.. They don't maintain database of registered devices.. And ask serial number on product packing, in case of warranty.. I registered my products with jbl official site, now its saying no products registered.. Use and throw company products.. Go for boat,ant,boult in worst cases go with Ptron, service might be delayed but he does provide good after sales.

name: Deepesh kumar
title: Battery is a little sad but overall great performance
content: The sound quality in terms of music, bass, voice clarity is all fantastic. Be a little careful when using this with Mac Book Pro.... somehow there is an issue with the Bluetooth configuration of Mac that stops detecting the mic of the JBL earpiece. It even makes my Bluetooth mouse connected with Mac slaggy.. Other than that, this works just fine.

name: Praveen M
title: Recommend buy for below 1K
content: .Worth for below 1,000.. .Build quality is average(see pic). .Bluetooth reception is good.. .Product catelogue mentioned that fast charger will spoil the unit, should take care of it.. .Bass boost using buttons is bit tricky.. .Online warrate option mentioned in the box and catelogue, but could not complete it.. .Treble seems less.. * Still need ro check how long the battery will last.

name: vikash kochar
title: Comparable to MI sports wireless bluetooth
content: Decent product for Rs. 900. Bass is good, noise cancellation due to rubber seals is decent. Only drawback, the fit is not that great, it keeps popping out . Also the neck band being heavier, it pulls the earpiece out of the ears. All in all, for the price it's decent. Battery life is also good. It is comparable to MI sports wireless bluetooth in terms of battery life and noise cancellation. But between the JBL and MI, the MI has a much better sound quality. I've used both and the MI one has low quality wires connecting the earpiece and battery life is lesser than JBL one.

name: Tanmoy C.
title: Quite good for the given price range
content: This earphones almost completely seal your ears, bass is quite high even in normal mode, good for watching movies and music, call quality is good also. But battery life is average, comfort is not upto the mark, careful when changing the ear buds tips as the net on the buds are very near to the surface and super fragile and can break even with a blow of wind. Ear buds are little heavy. Not tested it for gaming. But in the given price range it's quite impressive. Super easy to handle and carry... made for rough use. But be careful its volume can go quite high, and since it completely seals your ears, u can even listen to the thunderstorms, so do not use it outside, roads or public place. Bluetooth range is good and well built and swaet or splash proof. 12mm dynamic driver truly delivers. All over if u r looking for something to rough use indoor or for gym and u want it for music and movies, it's quite good in rs 1299/-. The price of this product often changes in Amazon. I found the lowest to be rs. 1299/-.

name: Ramesh singh
title: Value for money üò≠üò≠
content: Boat rockers are much better then this even u can get pro one's in boat for this price point. Absolute blunder by infinity. Bluetooth range is worse. U can't use them while charging they automatically turn off.. 2.5 hrs to get charged. Connectivity issue irritates me a lot.. The design of the band is so bad that even if you jog they comes out from the ear.. I will recommend please go for boat , mivi.. Mic quality is also average.. There was no refund policy so buy on ur own risk.

name: Kindle Customer
title: Mid range neckband
content: I was sceptical about the product on arrival. However next 10 days of use has made a positive attitude from my side.. Pros Lightweight, maybe you won't realise there's a neckband on you. Good sound with bass, easy on ears over long periods, easy pairing, modest battery life. Cons MicroUSB charging port, build not reassuring as neckband is thin and not reinforced.. Overall worth buying at 1200

name: Roshan G
title: Useless product
content: Used this product for the last 2.5 months. The product quality is very flimsy and pathetically built and never qualifies to Harman standars. The right side part of the earphone has come apart and i've stopped using it. Sound quality and bass is excellent at this price point. Background noise is very much audible during con calls. Overall, not worth.

name: Nikhil Raj
title: Review after 3 months of usage!!
content: Writing this review after using it for 3 months.. Pros:. 1. Good build quality.. 2. Sound quality is satisfactory , infact bass is pretty good.. 3. No distortion even on high volume. 4. Value for money. Cons:. 1. Battery has to be fully charged to get the best out of it, takes about 2 hours to charge it.. 2. Full charge : 5-6 hours. 50% charge : 1 -2 hours max. That's the disappointment.. 10-20% charge: 30mins max. Not a bad earphones specially considering the price, no connectivity issues so far. Value for money.

name: Vinayak S.
title: Good product brought at ‚Çπ.1299
content: Good built quality.. True sound as described in product.. Battery life depends on usage.. Overall a perfect wireless headphones for music, movies, etc.

name: Srijit Chatterjee
title: Designed for targeted consumer
content: i am not writing about the design. i will just focus on the functioning quality.. Sound Quality:. i would say "excellent"! Lows and Mids are very good. Highs are missing a bit, but can be adjusted by equalizer. The "Deep Bass" mode is excellent for songs demanding bass. The sound quality in both the modes "Normal & Deep Bass" is excellent, I fills the ears very deeply, truly a JBL quality.. Bluetooth Connectivity:. Excellent connectivity. Pairing is very smooth. Range is good. No lag in video playing and on youtube.. Battery:. It gives me a backup of more than 6.5 hours easily on 80% volume. Recharging is taking a bit long than claimed. Recharge time mentioned on Box: 1.5 Hrs. Time taking: Around 2 Hrs. on a 5Volt 2 Amp Charger.. Call Quality:. This is the weak point of this product. The mic quality is not that great. It does not pickup the voice that good. It is just very average. Not recommended, if calling is very important or primary.. Bottom line: If listening is the primary need (and very high treble is not required) along with some basic calls feature, definitely go ahead, you will not regret. The sound quality is really great after burnout of 2-3 hrs.

name: Jos
title: Damaged product
content: The product is not working it was working normally for 5 days , after that all of a sudden stop working..... It looks like damaged or manufacturing defected piece. I would looking forward to Amazon prime customer care service people do the needful.thanking you. Jothi. 6304514725.

name: G.srinivasarao
title: Low price performance higher
content: My mobile one plus 7 pro. Sound experience super. Deep bass super punchy. Battery backup good. Good quality flexible nechband. This price range Good Worth of money

name: Rohitashwa Mishra
title: A budget friendly earphone and best in this price point.
content: I have been using boatrockerz 255f amd then i switched to this earphone, the voice is loud from boatrockerz, the build quality is good, it is just light weight, when you are on a two wheeler then you need to keep a watch on this earphone because it tends to fly away,you need to constantly ajust the mic because it flies away due to light weight. Don't expect a thumping bass from this earphone, i bought this earphone for 899rs, but even for 1100rs it is a good deal.. On warranty terms jbl replaces your earphone,they don't repair so this thing is good.. The fit is also nice.

name: S H
title: Reviewing after 1 month use
content: I am reviewing exactly after 1 month using it. I got it for 899 and hence I am not much disappointed.. I bought only because it's a product from HARMAN thinking it would keep minimum quality in sound as in JBL and AKG. Now I knew that it's not fair to compare JBL or AKG with Infinity.. Build quality is good.. It doesn't fall out... fits perfect. It's flexible... not too heavy.... you won't feel you are wearing it.. You can carry in your pockets.. Quality of sound is very bad. Bass quality is very bad. Noise cancellation is also bad. It's loud enough but sound quality is terrible.. If you are looking for better sound quality then this is not recommended.

name: JJ
title: Budget earphones
content: I choose this for the first time on the behalf of the name of Harman and jbl, I also have real me buds q and sony earphones, talking about the above purchase I advise you to all that go for this if only if you have only tight budget or gift someone e.g wife or children or elder ones.. Peoples who are using sony didn't expect so much from this, this only good for regular work conditions but if you want more then forget.. I listen so much songs, I have both music apps you tube music and jio saavn but this one good for jio app.. But I have to tell one thing on highest volume the quality of sound gets high, but that sound we can't bear for long time periods as 12mm drivers give big sound.. Company have to work on this this is my own experience. Good for everyday use which is optional for another expensive one, equalizer setting just average only two modes normal and bass, first one ok only

name: PADMANABHAN.K
title: Don't buy this product. Not worth the cost. Go for Sony, little more costly but value for money.
content: Only Negatives:. - Ears pains even with 15 minutes usage and leads to headache.. - Metal Earbuds often tend to fall, does not get fixed to ear properly.. - Earbuds feels little heavier.. - Battery not upto the mark.. Is it possible for an exchange with some other model or can money be refunded.

name: shridhar k
title: Lit üî•üî•
content: Just wow. Guys really its a üî•üî•üî•. What an amazing product üòçüòç. The bass quality is way better than anything you can mention in this price range. Guys don't think much just go for it you will not regret it üòâ. Sound quality is superb fantastic. I don't know about battery performance coz just used for like 30 min still üíØ!!. I will again write review about remainning after using for 1 month

name: Johnson BƒÅg
title: Not JBL but Harman infnity still Better deal under 1000
content: Bought this during sale . This is good compare to other brands . Its not jbl but it is Harman infinity all jbl infinity akg comes under Harman . But they are selling its as ininity jbl glide 120 to get more attention & sales . People buy jbl like they buy gold ,its demonstration effect. Hey seller jbl is standard but don't deceive your buyers in the name of jbl . Tell honestly that its from the house of jbl . Otherwise everything is fine with this, Bluetooth 4hrs ,sound is good but noise cancellation is not up to the mark due to those hard rubber . The wire to earphones are soft but not strong . I had issue with charging port cover its hard to remove there is high possibility that it may break anytime if not removed properly.. Will Update if problems found .

name: PRANAV A.
title: Amazing for average Joe, maybe not for pros
content: Bought this few days ago. The return windows ends tomorrow. Speaking about the product,. 1. Sound quality: The sound quality can be amazing, but it depends a little with your device. The earphone has its own bass boosting systems, so you might have to adjust the device Equalizer or else mid and high range can be little low. The bass boost mode will literally feel like a JBL.. 2. Charge: it's okay, the charge percentage shown in device might not be very accurate. When charging for the 1st time, make sure you charge until the light turns blue so that your battery is calibrated.. 3. Looks and quality: I thought the yellow might look not so good, but it was cheaper. But when the product arrived, it's okay. Maybe the red looks better, I don't know, bit yellow is not bad. The build quality is up to standards, as it's from the same company as JBL.. Overall, the people who rated it down must be professional musicians or something, as for average Joe, this thing is beautiful.. Will update if any problem is found. For now, considering the MRP is 3000, if you get more than 60% off, go for it. Else, there might be better products.

name: John D
title: Good but not the best in this price range.
content: Delivered as committed by Amazon. Sound quality : wonderful. Bass and Treble: wonderful. Build quality : Average. I think JBL could have worked a bit better on the build quality being a famous company that they are as the wires of the earphone seem to be not as good as boat and other brands in the same customer market.. Battery seemed good as it went for about 10 hours of play time. The same battery life goes with boat aswell.. I have bought this earphones just a couple of days back hence can't comment on its durability as it is too early. But if given an option of choosing between boat 225/325 and infinity JBL, I would opt for Boat as the build quality is better.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Doesn't hold connection well
content: Its sound quality is pretty good for the price. Good balance of bass and treble but it has a high bass mode which is horrible. It artificially boosts the bass which sounds very bad.. The biggest problem is that it doesn't hold connection well and keeps dropping to the point that its become almost un useable for me now. In the middle of the music playing it keeps says "disconnected" and then "connected".

name: Mohan More
title: Average product.
content: Overall average earphone. Sound is not so impressive though it has 12 mm drivers as it was expected. If compare with other earphones we will get better sound even having 10 mm drivers in it e.g. Boult Earphone and the model is probass X 11. Probass X Flow of Boult is not available with Amazon. I do not know the reasons hence I can not comment. I missed the acoustic sound and deep bass in Infinity Glide 120 as it was purchased by me attracting to the brand name. Even Boat earphones could lag behind the race of quality sound with the Boult Earphones. Infinity should improve the quality of their products. Thanks.

name: amey bhargava
title: LATENCY SUCKS, sound quality is adequate. LATENCY SUCKS.
content: I bought thia for 1,099rs. Its good for just songs at adequate amount of bass. You cant expect much from a Bluetooth headset anyway. DONT BUY THIS FOR WATCHING VIDEOS, THE LATENCY IS TERRIBLE even on youtube. So you can imagine how game sounds on this junk. In COD mobile you will hear the sniper sound after the enemy is dead. P.s. buy a good quality wired earphone if you are not bitten by the bug of getting a wireless headset and please get this review enough likes that i might get a refund.

name: Mukesh Soni
title: Ok kind of product, ear fitment issue
content: Ok ok kind of Product. Not comfortable in ear fit, start paining or irritating after few minutes of uses. Design is just ordinary round shape earbuds so ear grip is also not good , for keep it fit in ear you need to push it hard inside to it will make you uncomfortable within ears after few min. Voice touch is also ok kind. Music output is average.

name: Kapil Sharma
title: Sound iis OK but not the design
content: No issues with sound quality so far, but while taking a call, you would need find the mouthpiece as it does not stay fixed in your neck. It does not hang in there and keeps going behind your neck as the neck base is made of wire, instead of thick and heavy plastic material. It's like a normal earplug (all wires) in a neckband shape. There is no weight to keep it hanging in one place.

name: Vikas Choudhary
title: Superb 4Star ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è
content: Superb Product in 899 Festivals sale offer. Sound is so high ,. Bass is like a DJ. Before this I tried Wings Glide, Samsung U level , Ane One plus bullet Bluetooth but all that are nothing in from of jbl infinity Bluetooth. It‚Äôs totally awesome. I love it .. Cons-. Bettry back is no more. So that it‚Äôs very disappointed. Bettry is main issue in this product

name: Mayur
title: Awesome sound quality
content: 1. Cristal clear sound.. 2. Fits well in any ear size.. 3. Perfect balance of Low, Mids and Highs.. 4. Mind blowing bass quility. Just shake your head. Perfect for bass lover.. 5. Value for money, I bought it for 890.00 on Festival sale.. 6. Instanant connect to bluetooth. Range of bluetooth is also preity good.. 7. Go for it if you are a music lover because in this price you wont get a better option..

name: fareed khan
title: Nice Sound quality
content: Nice product. Sound quality is very good. Bass is very good.

name: Madappa P S
title: Good product for the price
content: Pros:. Has great battery back up. One charge lasts around 6 to 7 hours.. Bluetooth connectivity is pretty quick.. Bass quality is deep and sound clarity is refined to a great extent.. The earbuds are very comfortable and does not hurt the ear. It does not fall out while engaging in physical activities.. The Wires are sturdy. Cons:. The Volume button seem to be made of cheap plastic.. The Metal design is a little bulky imo.. The wires slip from the shoulder sometimes.. The charging cable is very short.

name: Bhushan Atkar
title: Honest review!
content: For 799 /- no doubt a good one to buy.. Sound:- The speakers have the potential you just need to adjust equalizer and you're good to rock( I'm using doly atmos), bass and treble are blanced now!. Build:- build is good enough, but if you're going to lift dumbbells with it, sorry go for another one, obviously you're not doing that, in that sense build is good.. Bluetooth:- thanks to BT 5.0 the range is awesome.. Audio Latency:- yes there is noticeably latency!! For gaming I'll not suggest you this one.. Battery:- Of course you'll not use it for straight 7 hours, but tge battery is enough for one day normal use.. Thanks Amazon for tge service. (My grandfather told to write this).

name: sudhakar shree vatsasa
title: There is noise cancellation
content: This infinity glide Bluetooth earphones are real good for hearing songs, but when it comes calls the performance is real poor, first of all I doubt that there is noise cancellation feature in this product the caller can perfectly hear surroundings except your voice, I think this should be called as noise addition, final word is that if you are just buying ear phones for entertainment these are the best for the price.

name: Yash
title: Not Easy to Use ü•∫
content: Well, if you are looking to replace the bud size to small as the big ones won't fit! Don't go for it.. The small buds have some manufacturing issues. It is not fitting and you may end up damaging the product. üíî. Plus the product doesn't appear classy - The wire around the neck is pretty loose and your mike will dwindle and fall off the right position!. I was very excited! But in the end was disappointed - please look for GoNoise or BoAt as an option!

name: Kapil Rakwal
title: Not worth it!!
content: i received this product 2 days back. Most of the time other person complains that they are not able to hear me. i have to remove this headphone and then talk. this is good for listening music but facing issues sometimes with calls. I want to return this product and instead go for a better option even though i have to spend more money but looks like this is not possible now. Only replacement is possible but i guess replacement would also work same way. Disappointed.

name: P K
title: Ok. Fine
content: Ok we can use this.. Can't turn up high volume,u will feel irritate. U can't use while laying because it always falls. Impressive about battery backup. But i felt my earlier one realme earphone was better one. But it stopped working one speaker after one year. So don't know when this will end like that..

name: Shashank Verma
title: Honest review for non technical buyers, like me üòâ
content: Like: At ‚Çπ899, it is much better than Boat products. I have used Boat as well, and feel this one is better in all params (people may have different opinion). Pairing is quick, charging time is also quick. Maintains battery levels for around 6-7 hrs give or take (on one full charge I watched one full movie and three eps of a webseries). Call quality is very impressive and clarity on both recieving and speaking is actually very good.. Cons: Build quality is "feeble". It seems it will break if not handled with care. But at this price level that is a bargain tbh.. Overall I would recommend this to those who just want an earphone for regular use. For those who are too much into technical stuff like bass, sound etc I cannot comment if this is worth your money.

name: krishtheindian
title: Poor Mic Quality
content: I bought this mainly for using in office calls. But the Microphone is a big disappointment. Only if you keep near your mouth, your voice is heard by others. In normal position others compliant that voice cannot be heard. I returned the first delivery and got a replacement. But it seems to be an inherent design problem!! You can use to listen to music!! Not recommended for taking calls!

name: Siddhpura Mitt
title: TL;DR : Sound Quality=Great, Call Quality=Excellent, Price vs Value=decent, Durability=?
content: Along with the review, I would like to add some information (added at the end) as well that I feel is not properly available.. Price : INR 1299 and Initial Impressions Review. Review :. Sound Quality : Great but not Excellent. The biggest value with this earphone is that you can enjoy music of most spectrum with the "normal mode". With under INR 2000, as against Realme Buds and Boats rockers earphones, this was one of the best wireless earphones that had a "normal bass mode".
