I am not a bass head and if you too are not, kindly consider this option. I personally use Sennheiser CX 180 and JBL C100SI. If I compare, the sound quality is kind of similar to Sennheiser CX 180 and particularly the bass is more than what Sennheiser CX180 offers but less than that produced by JBL C100SI IN BASS MODE. Though I prefer flat headphone types, I do enjoy Jazz or heavy metal music as well as music with thump beats in "deep bass" mode in this earphones. At full volume, the earphones do not sound that great, but I guess that issue is with every budget segment earphones. Unlike what many have mentioned, I really did not find any delay between video and audio playback, whether it was online streaming on OTT apps or offline.. Call Quality : Excellent. I had the budget to buy earphones upto INR 2000 and One plus bullets Z at INR 1999 really felt like a good deal. The problem is that I found many reviews of One plus stating the problem that they had to bring the Mic up close. One of the reasons I chose this earphone is because I did not find any such reviews with Infinity Glide 120. In my experience as well, the call quality was excellent, for me and the listener on the other side, during normal calls as well as WhatsApp calls.. Range=Excellent. I have moto G5s Plus that has a aluminum uni-body and because it has a metal casing, I always have problem with network and connectivity. With this mobile, I could get a range of 15 feet (clear sight view). However, using this earphone with my laptop, I got atleast further 5 feet addition in range. With the marketed 10 meter range, I do not know how much that holds in practical scenario.. Durability = ?. It better be good. I really can't say on the durability and I hope it lasts long. I will update this review in case, I find any issues.. Price vs Value=Decent. One of the cons with these earphones is that unlike other manufacturers, it doesn't have the ability to pair with more than one devices and the same time. Moreover, with a different perspective, the sound quality produced by these earphones are comparable (and not better) than wired earphones (Sennheiser CX 180 and JBL C100SI) that are available at half the price. I understand that the sound quality cannot be compared of wired and wireless earphones but I really think that as a consumer paying twice the money, I should get better sound quality atleast by marginal improvement.. User Experience :. 1. One of the biggest pros of the product is that I did not have to worry if the mic is close enough to my mouth. The call quality on the other side was decent. I feel that the trigger time to play previous/next song while holding down the Volume +/- key is very long.. 2. Moreover, changing between 'normal mode' and 'deep bass' mode with pressing volume +/- key simultaneously is not one-handed operation even though I tried.. 3. Unlike other products available at a higher price, the magnets are not "functional" in the context of functioning as play/pause or on/off trigger.. Important Information :. 1. As attached in the spec sheet from the official website, the 7 hour music playback time is with 50% volume, something that should be known.. 2. As compared to here, you can also check the reviews on the other website of the competition in which Infinity Glide N120 is available. Both the models, Infinity Glide 120 and Infinity Glide N120 are same with the difference of hard plastic neckband in "N120" model. You may also check those reviews which has 6x times more ratings/review as compared to here. I believe this is because this product in not highlighted in first two pages in "wireless earphones" section.. Hope this review was helpful.

name: Abhishek Saha
title: For Bass Lover
content: @900 rupees - Those who really looking for for Deep Bass, just go for it. At this price range - quality and performance is good.. Build quality : Ok. Device weight : Bulky. Sound quality : Average with dep Bass.. Overall , this is fine product at this price range (dont compare with Bose, RHA, Sennheiser , B&O)

name: VaraPrasad
title: Can only Listen to Audio. Severe Lag while playing Videos on Mobile, Laptop & iPad.
content: Can only Listen to Audio. Severe Lag while playing Videos on Mobile, Laptop & iPad. Overall Design is Good. If you intend only to listen music alone, you can purchase them. If you want to watch Videos on YouTube, what's app, prime to hotstar, you will experience severe lag. And this Item is Just replaceable But Not refunded.

name: abi s.
title: Opinion after 1 week usage
content: After 1 week of usage,. Here's my opinion ; (a detailed honest review). Its definitely worth for the price you pay.. Has average battery back-up.(nearly 8 hrs) and charges very fast(in 1 hour). The build quality is also great. Has a metal housing of earbuds which is better in terms of ruggedness and sound damping(if you are more into bass). The battery compartment & control compartment is dense plastic made.. The IPX5 sweat and water resistance is convincingly helpful whenever working out or listening to music in drizzle rain. BT version 5.0 is very neat and clean and gives a seamless connection, even through 2 concrete walls( I've tested üëç). Based on sound quality, it packs the Harman kardon signature sound. Also has two inbuilt EQ mode(normal and deep bass ). Honestly speaking, the deep bass mode increases the low frequency area (i.e, bass) but also decreases the high frequency and mid range frequency (i.e, vocals and melodic instruments). This mode is only ideal for EDM genre, hip-hop genre and rock genre.. The normal mode is most ideal for melodic songs, romantic songs, etc. This also benefits that you can switch over whenever required(because in other high bass, deep bass, ultra bass earphones, melodic songs will be crap). It DOESN'T have an active noise cancellation.. I mean, come on.. don't expect noise cancelling earphones in this price range. It isn't equipped with any noise cancellation technology, except the passive noise cancellation (which is only provided by the tight sealed rubber earbuds). And it has good microphone noise reduction while calling.. That's all. Now my opinions if you are trying to buy this earphones ;. This is the better earphones in this price range . Trust me cause I've researched a lot about earphones before buying.. And also you can see two versions of this earphones in amazon and flipkart which is- infinity glide 120(amazon) and infinity glide N120(flipkart). There is a slight difference in these 2. The one from the Flipkart is 100 rupees more costly and also has a hard rubber neckband.. The one from the Amazon is 100 rups cheap than from flipkart and doesn't have a neck-'BAND'. And the amazon product is better in my opinion bcs, it is more flexible and convenient in handling. If you are on a strict budget, try this one. If you can add a slight 700/- more .. Absolutely try the new boAt rockerz 355. Launched today, only the best earphones for 2000/- range.. Hope I'm helpful

name: Vijay.chotrani1
title: Reviews infinity
content: Don't think its just my personal review or fake review or want to degrade stras Don't want to add a photo but added no good bass a little bass, if you want to use this learn how to operate it will not work accurate if you don't know how to use it takes some time to catch the command for bass a little second , need to change the ear buds and th√©y slips alot not good for big ear hols....not good for exercise slips alot ....they are chargin 300rs extra....as per the quality....checked you tube to know everything....voice on call is not good like you wear and put on neck the manner w√© usually wear... If we put a little near to mouth it works good...v√≥ice o√± play music good...it is known for...other functions are good....next song prevs so√±g is good,...price is ok good f√≥r mature people.....i don't want to tell more thanks for real fbüòä

name: Varun Verma
title: Do not buy. They are crap
content: Pros-. a) light weight. b) BT range is nice.. c) mic quality is good. Cones-. a) sound quality is not that what you expect from a JBL / Harman Carden head phones. Bass is 4/5. Mids and treble 2.5/5.. b) low latency issue. I.e. if you are watching a YouTube video or playing a game sounds comes 2-3 second after the video. It is Very very annoying and frustrating. c) betttry is not great but okish.. d) next / Previous button - gesture doesn't work with YouTube music and iTunes apps.. ( Didn't checkd with other apps). My final verdict - Do not buy. They are crap.. Go for actual JBL or OnePlus earphones.

name: MUTHUKUMAR
title: Ok.. Not so great!!
content: Delivery was fast. Amazon service was fantastic.. Coming to product.. Infinity- the brand known for floor standers and home theatres. I was disappointed with the sound quality with infinity glide 120.. Build quality is top notch. Bluetooth connection was trouble free.. For attending phone calls this is very good.. But for audiophiles, this is not the one. Bass quality is poor. High frequency is harsh and lacks crisp and clarity compared to my Soundmagic E10C. Hear it in less volume, treble is ok. If volume is increased, the more harsh it becomes.. The strength of Glide 120 is mid range.. If you are a mid range lover, go for it. Even with deep bass option( by pressing volume + and - keys simultaneously), only the mid bass increases. I have uploaded a frequency meter with flat equiliser setting, which shows a inverted V style, with prominence in midrange.. Stereo imaging is good.. Over all Harman has to concentrate on drivers for improving low and high frequency.

name: chetankumar patel
title: Excellent ear phones
content: Has good sound clarity and bass effect. Due to dual bass, we can also have bass effect without the equalizers. So, suitable for YouTube and movies where there is no equalizer support. Gets full charge within 1.5 hrs. Gives backup of 7 to 8 hours. Flexible cable makes it easy to put in the small place.

name: Arshad uddin
title: Everything you need except the yellow-dots design.
content: I wanted to buy a pair of earphones from a renowned and trusted brand, in terms of sound quality. So I had this bunch of options from Realme, Mi, Boult, BOAT and others... But I know what a perfectly tuned earphones sound like, from JBL, Sony, senheisser etc.. which are very much costly compared to the bugdet brands out there.. Then I got to know about Infinity, a sub brand from Harman which is focussed on less expensive audio devices. Because obviously they don't want to decrease the price of already existing sub brands like JBL.. So I order these Infinity Glide 120 @Rs. 899/- after going through a lot of positive reviews and sufficient specs at this price range.. Although, I didn't like the yellow patches here and there which provide a seal for water resistance, I bought these as I focused on sound and not looks.. It may be good design to others but I prefer the most plain and basic designs in everything.. The design is quite elegant though, it could have been even better (for me) if they provided another colour variat with black patches.. And coming to the most important part, the sound quality, be assured that you are getting a great balanced sound with clear vocals and Excellent balanced bass.. And yeah that DEEP BASS mode helps for people who love to pain their eardrums with thumping Bass. I'm not an extra bass lover but music sounds better with Deep bass mode On.. And for the comfort part, it's not so good for long hours of use. I used the smallest sized eartips but still I can't use it longer. It's definitely not the most comfortable pair of earphones out there.. Also, another variant of this one called GLIDE N120 (N is for neckband) is completely the same except the thicker and less flexible neck band.. I carry my earphones in my pocket or in a travel pouch and so neckband wasn't my choice. This model, Glide 120, is perfect to carry around.. For me, this is perhaps the best sounding Bluetooth earphones considering the price of less than Rs. 1000.

name: HS
title: Perfect
content: Everything is perfect.. I had tested for ultimate headphones test and everything works perfectly. The bass, treble, connectivity, noise cancellation, fitting is awesome. Battery backup depends on sound level. The cons is headphone did not support magnetic switching i.e. when connected together headphones did not disconnects (power offs) like Oneplus Z or Realme Buds.

name: konark mohanty
title: HONESTLY, JUST BUY SOMETHING ELSE.
content: Looks like Infinity JBL has put up a clearance sale for a product with design and technical flaws. Firstly, the noise cancelation (to user) and the ambient noise/chatter reduction(to listener) is really poor. Secondly, the in-ear bud shape is probably too big for my ears (tried all ear tips) - doesn't seem to offer a snug fit (I'm a medium sized in-ear guy, buds from Mi to Airpods fit perfectly, JBL Infinitys' don't. Then we come to the inconvenient neck band, which is not well balanced, keeps slipping off to the left side (weight on the left probably due to bluetooth unit is more) doesn't actually stay as well as other earphones would and slips off to either side or on your back rather easily. Ergonomics department gets a zero, and I honestly don't care if it works well in your test labs. A big NO to be used during work out or jogging- will distract you with it's flimsy behavior. So then, summing up, not good for sports or workouts, uncomfortable while in regular use, so what really is your purpose cheap junk from JBL Infinity?

name: Abhinav Lal
title: At This Pricing It Has The Best Performance
content: The product at this pricing (I bought it for ‚Çπ999) is good. Sound quality is really good. The deap bass mode gives a nice experience. Build quality is decent and the material is soft. The battery backup is not up to the mark. This is medium quality ranged product but if you are looking for a high end performance you can pick the 'Bose' range.

name: amazon lover
title: Worth it but price could have been lower
content: Gifted this to my brother on his birthday. Really useful for office people who always have to talk with clients.. He is happy with it and has no complains so far. Sound quality is decent and noise cancellation is good too.. Price could have been a lil lower

name: sanskaar shankhala
title: Awesome bass quality.
content: I am writting this after like 15 days of use. I got these at an astonishing price of 799. When i got these i thought there was some problem in it. When i was using these and no music was playing a static noise( very low) use to buzz and that disturbed me alot. I decided to replace the item. I got the replaced item in like 2 days. And the new ones are free from that buzzing. There was no problem in the replace thanks to amazon!. Now coming to the product.. Sound quality is real good for an under 1k bt earphone. The main focus of these beasts is the baaaass. Its has really really good bass quality. However the noise cancellation is not that great. Coming to the battery backup, i charged it full and used it for like 4-5 days straight for like 1.5 to 2 hrs daily listening music. I would say that these are specially for bass lovers.. Coming to the build quality. The magnets are really strong. The earpieces too are tough. The thing that may bother someone is the pliable neck wire. It doesnt have a stiff collar as in the boat bt earphones which i didnt want purposefully but if someone is into sports or something like that it may bother you cause the wire just slides from right to left however tou can tuck the wire inside your shirt collar but still.. Overall, it is a perfect bt earphones with awesome sound quality, awesome bass quality and aweeesome price. Go for it.

name: y p yadav
title: not compatiblt with amazon fire tv stick.
content: everything is ok but audio is breaking with amazon fire tv stick, with sony tv.i talked helpline, they replied that it is not compatible with amazon fire tv stick. very shocking. amazon is requested to update the software of fire tv stick to compatible to it plz.

name: Avishek
title: Best one in budget. Does the job.
content: I was looking for a basic Bluetooth earphones in tight budget. I wanted to use for online teaching as I don't listen to music that much. These ones does the job pretty well. The sound quality is great too. But the best things about the product are the range and battery life. Amazing one. There is no smart control though. And music crackles at highest volume. Still you are getting great value for what you are paying.

name: R Abishek Bharadhwaj
title: A truly VFM pair of wireless earphones
content: The first headphones I started using was the sennheiser cx180 and boy oh boy that had a good bass until I met the infinity glide 120. These earphones are equally good if not better in their music quality. The battery lasts easily for 5-6 hrs after a full charge, the charging itself is quite fast. The cables are sturdy and the earphones with the mic buttons are simple and easy to use. I would have given it a total 5 but in my recent experience one earbud died out within a year of use (reason unknown) but the I enjoyed the music until then. If you're quite obsessed about listening to music with good bass and quality, these are worth the money.

name: Arnez Driver
title: DO NOT BUY!!!
content: Worst buy ever, they stopped working within a month. There was daily use of less than 2 hours and was always charged. The earphones will just not switch on. Also while they were working for the 30 days, sound quality was average and Bluetooth connectivity was very annoying (just used to take forever to connect). Over all I would advise highly against buying these, rather add a thousand more and buy something worth while.

name: Ujjwal Raj
title: DO NOT !
content: PS:Its nothing but just a piece of momentary pleasure. I bought it on 3 Nov 2020 and now its 30 Nov 2020 (the day i'm writing the review). I mainly bought it for my gym workouts because it caught my attention because it is JBL and the IPX5 protection. On 29th Nov it completely stopped working. I did try to claim for the warranty but my product wasn't enlisted there in the list . No doubt it has a deep bass and nice sound quality, but 900 rupees for 20 days of use? üôÉ. Hum bhi pele gaye thay.... Tum bhi pele jaaoge...... Mat khareedo....

name: Amazon Customer
title: Average product with some pros ans cons, expected a better one in this price range
content: I used it to connect to my work laptop. Bluetooth connectivity does not seem to work well, it gets disconnected during the call itself, need a reconnect from connection settings.. Default earbud is not as soft and useful as that of AKG from same manufacturer.. Sound quality is average for this price range. While a small lag is observed in sound transmission from mobile phones as well. Expected a better product from JBL.. Bluetooth connectivity is a big drawback. Needs immediate improvement.

name: brock
title: Devüëå
content: Bass is awesome truly jbl like experience please listen unforgottable feat swae lee and you will feel the real bass üòò

name: ARVIND
title: JBL GLIDE 120 üåü üåü üåüüåüüåü
content: GREAT PRODUCT. VALUE FOR MONEY. Wonderful Product. SOUND QUALITY. Great Vocals. Great Mids. Great Highs. BASS QUALITY. EQ 2 PREDEFINED SOUNDS. BASS & DEEP BASS. NOISE CANCELLATION. Noise cancellation for outside noise and Noise cancellation for call quality. BATTERY BACKUP. Great Battery Back up. All day battery with Regular use ... Continue use 5-6 hrs. Like back to back movie watching at 80%+ volume. Thanks to Amazon

name: ramakrishna
title: A honest review after using for 48 hrs
content: The quality of product is good,lighter,fits properly in the ear just have to select correct size but for long time listening has pain of ears. U can wear in the helmet but u can't use voice assistant while driving on bike the 3 button remote reachability is little bit difficult while driving bike 0 to 100 percent charging time 2hrs 15 min good sound best product for 849 rupees no connectivity issues I have faced till now I am writing this review after using for 48 hrs in all conditions play back time is 6 to 7 hrs based on volume call quality is good while in home office driving

name: Ankit Sharma
title: Music Lovers can Skip This!
content: Design, Build quality and Bass is Good.. Treble is Very Bad. The sound seems very muffled and is Not Clear.. The sound quality does not justify the price. You will feel like you are using a local wired earphone of ‚Çπ200 or less.. Better to skip this and choose others, basis their reviews.

name: Gautam Piplani
title: Average pair with decent sound quality and average experience.
content: An average product but not the kind you expect from JBl since I already have JBL Infinity Headphones-501.. The major drawback is that as-soon-as you like down, the buds gets popped out of the ear due to less grip. Also, tye batter backup is ordinarily as it gets drained out fast and would not even last for a day with decent ussage for music abd audio calls

name: Anishka
title: Bad for phone calls, average for Music
content: Its reminds me the old days when your musical gadgets catches electrical interference and gives a humming sound.. One of the bad headphones i had ever used.. I had exchanged it but results remain same as bad as previous one.. It disconnected frequently, you need to pair it again and again. During calls its sound is pathetic due to annoying interference noise.. For Music only its good.. I wish if get a chance to return it, but due to amazon new policy you only get option of replacement.

name: Vijaya Sankar N
title: Does its duty but no noise cancellation
content: After the first impression, product is good.. Deep Bass Mode:. Just boosts the bass. It differs based on the song. Not a real bass! Continued use gives head-pain unlike other bass sounds. Since it is not natural.. Normal Mode:. Good for hearing and good bass.. Microphone:. Good clarity voice. But 0 noise cancellation. I tried with the meetings. I was told they heard background noise. When I recorded the meeting, even the people talking in the next room are clearly recorded. Even our bear ears would hear less! Noise cancelling is poor and do not go for it if you are looking for that option. Otherwise it's a good product.. Batter Performance: Yet to check, will update once it is verified.

name: Subash S.
title: ONLY 1 EARPLUG!!!!
content: I was surprised to find that there was only 1 EARPLUG as the other earplug seemed to be deliberately cut off. Luckily, the Amazon customer service said that I'll get a replacement....but am still worried if the product is original. üôÑ

name: Pradeep
title: Good product from a well known brand
content: Does the job. Is a well known brand and fulfills all the promises it makes. You can see the detailed features on product page on Amazon. I am not an expert but as a regular user I can say I am happy with the purchase. Sound is good. Noise cancellation also as it should be.

name: Bhavin chauhan
title: Heavy bass !
content: It has very load and clear extra Bass.. Very nice for calling purpose , distortion free voice calls . For music , it gives little irritation in ear because of Heavy bass. Overall you can go for this in 1300‚Çπ price Range.. # product in manufactured In China. (As per box lebel)

name: Nikhil Tomar
title: Just OK
content: Firstly the charging cable was missing from the box. Second, the build quality is good. Third, Bass quality is just OK...not that great. There are only 2 equaliser settings - normal and deep base. Overall it is good for its price range. If you want better quality then you need to go above 1K rupees.

name: Priyankapkzone
title: Not working with Desktop , Useless 5.0 Bluetooth
content: Too much error is coming, such waste of money, good for kids only,. If you like good music don't suggest you buy this,. not is a single song till the day I bought it without any error played.. you will not enjoy any song because of the keep coming disturbance because of the Bluetooth connection problem.. if you love Music don't buy it. Again saying.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best buy, go for it!!!
content: This is my 3rd day using it, before this I had only used a wired headphones coz you won't get the same effect on bluetooth headset, I have used Dr. Dre, Sennheiser CX 180, CX 225, bose, but this is one of the best in wireless, I've tried Boult, noise and NU republic which my friends use, but this is way better than those don't go for nagative comments, if I face any problem will surely post in future.

name: Shiksha
title: It‚Äôs your choice to buy..
content: Ear phone is good looks are nice at this price voice is also ok. But which I don‚Äôt like is charging the Bluetooth earphones everydayüòû during video lectures battery last long 8-10 hours which is good but I really hate to charge. Otherwise at this price the bluetooth is good enough...

name: Ahmed
title: Cheap and quite decent
content: My honest opinion on these blue tooth earphones are that they are pretty dam good for the price range and for anyone looking to buy blue tooth earphones for cheap for clumsy carless people like me. Sound quality and bass it pretty dope, sits well in the ear and battery life so far isn't that bad at all. My overall rating for the product would be a 4.5 out 5. It is a pretty good deal and worth a buy for the price range, not to mention the product is by Harman, so for anyone you people who are looking clumsy and careless like me looking for cheap decent blue tooth earphones, I would highly recommend you keeping this as a option, music sounds great on VBR and FLAC format files.

name: rahul mazumder
title: The best in 1000-1200 price point.
content: Sounds is good for this price point, compared to my earphones that cost 3-4 times more obviously clarity is lesser but at this price point can't expect anything more. Premium build quality, working base boost mode, battery life 6 hours around. Detailed review on my YouTube channel Ride With Rahul.

name: dipayan das
title: COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY
content: THE NECK BAND WAS MADE FOR USING WHILE ON THE MOVE. HOWEVER AFTER USING IT I FOUND THAT IT DOES NOT HOLD ON TO THE EAR BUT IT FALLS VERY EASILY.. THE EAR PHONE CANNOT BE USED FOR EXERCISE PURPOSES OR FOR WALKING ALSO, LEAVE ALONE RUNNING.. IF THE PRODUCT CAN NOT HOLD ONTO ITS POSITION WHILE ON THE MOVE, THEN IT IS ABLOLUTELY NOT WORTH SPENDING, IF I HAVE TO WATCH LAPTOP OR MOBILE USING THE headphone, then why buy the bluetooth version and expose oneself to unwanted radiation.. dont buy this, it is a complete waste of money.

name: Harsh Bajpai
title: My review
content: Sounds quality: osm according to the price segmentüëç. Bass: With dual equaliser you can set between normal or deep bass. Noise cancellation: Fair. Cons: Many times audio from infinity glide 120 cutted down or fructuate üò° so i replace this item.. My view: I prefer them for normal day to day task, i am not prefer them to use in gym because this is a Bluetooth earphone not a Bluetooth neckband.

name: Hitesh
title: Want to return
content: Wish to return this product as after around 15 days of its delivery it has started showing problem in connection during calls.. Problem is, Amazon has closed it for replacement.. Problem continues.

name: chethan
title: Awesome bass with dual connectivity
content: An awesome Bluetooth earphones for great price . I had doubt whether it has dual connectivity but to my surprise it has and while I continue to listen music in laptop and when call comes I can pick the same. Only disappointment is the battery who‚Äôd come a for 4/5 hrs max and for complete charge it takes 2hrs. I got it for 1299 Rs

name: Venghat
title: Buy Buy Buy
content: I checked a Philips b/tooth headset twice before this JBL make. Philips 1st arrival did not work on my laptop. I replaced with another, it worked with laptop, but did not pair with my mobile. Frustrating to say the least.. On the other hand, JBL is an instant hit. Fits to ear properly. Sound quality is very good. A couple of issues I noted using this for the last 15d. 1. There is a few seconds lag in videos. 2. Battery slips from 30% to zero within 15min or so. Overall battery capacity is good and good coverage as well. I recommend this model over others..

name: anil kumar raizada
title: Very good sound, Battery backup and excellent Build.
content: I changed the buds and it fitted very well in the ears. Very good sound and clear call conversation. BATTERY IS VERY GOOD. AFTER MORE THAN 3HOURS OF CONTINUOUS USE THE BATTERY WAS SHOWING 70PERCENT FROM 90 PERCENT WHEN RECEIVED.. VERY GOOD. GLIDE 120

name: Shahid Maniyar
title: For the price ... really a great dealüëå
content: My1 week of experience .... - Sound quality is really great 4.5/5. - Even though it has 12mm drivers but the base doesn't feel that striking like don't get me wrong it has deep base but it is more like softer base not the striking one 4/5. - Batter life is really very great 5/5. - Materials used are great and overall build feels nice considering its price 4.5/5. - Comfort is really good, before this i was using earphones having those support for ear so it took me 2 3 days to get used to the normal earbuds of this but they are comfortable and you can use them for long durations..

name: MOHAMMED K.
title: Mediocre sound and connectivity, uncomfortable to wear,
content: The sound quality was as expected for the price point, the connectivity disappointed big time, it would disconnected or distort the moment you were 3-4 meters away from the device. The wire hanging around the neck moves around a lot which made it uncomfortable to put on, in ear it was fine, but around the neck and overall not so much, I eventually ended up displacing the earphones outdoors because of that :/. Decent pair of earphones, but there are better options at the given price point.

name: Shoeb Mohammad
title: Bass is gone in 3rd month
content: It's 3rd month I am using it. And I regret I bought this, I wish I could return and get my money. It is not same clear and bass is almost gone.. Battery is ok but music is so unpleasant. Road side 3.5mm jack headphone costing ‚Çπ49 is equal to this. So it should not be more then ‚Çπ149. Rest is your wish if you want to buy, take a chance

name: Aditya
title: Upto Expectations
content: The earphone is upto expectation. Easily detectable by both laptop (though there are issues with Ubuntu in particular but I guess that's an OS level issue and not hardware issue) and mobile.. Noise cancellation is good, not remarkable but it works. The issue is faced mainly due to the small size of the neckband. You have to keep the mic closer to your mouth in order to sound clear to the other person.. Sound quality is beyond good for this price range. It is perfect if you compare it to Realme buds, Boat Rocerz 255 or other similarly priced earphones. The bass is on point and the quality is crisp and clear. Overall its a worthy purchase. You can go for it given the quality and the brand behind it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not Worth the Brand.
content: JBL 120, not worth the price (‚Çπ1199), infact there are Indian Brands in half the price providing same sound quality, battery capacity & design. If u want JBL logo, then go for it. I sent it back for replacement. Got FLYBOT BLAZE for ‚Çπ750. Same quality & sound output.

name: Noothan Showri
title: Ok in price range
content: Good product in the price range.. lag - When you connect to single device then it's fine, but when connected to multiple devices then there is lag receiving audio.. Charge - backup wise it's ok, 3-4 hours on continues usage. If you are regular user, then daily charging is mandatory. Unlike my other Motorola headset which I charge once in couple of day's

name: K.M.
title: Not good
content: Resist from buying these, these don't sound like JBL, such a waste of money, some weird static noise can be heard in the background, very irritating, and once you power on it says "pairing" every time and then connects. If you are trying to power off with along press the middle button it calls someone who you last spoke to.

name: Sidharth Sarkar
title: Good For Voice Clarity But Not For Bass
content: Pros :-. 1) Good Sound Clarity. 2) Good Battery Life. 3) Very Lightweight Neckband. 4) Build Quality Is Sturdy. 5) Seamless Pairing With Android. 6) In Ear Design Helps In A Noise Cancelled Audio Experience. Cons :-. 1) Not Very good For Bass. 2) Have Pairing Problems With Windows. 3) Volume Buttons Are Sometimes Unresponsive. 4) Design Of The Metal Buds May Be Uncomfortable For Some People. 5) Does Not Have Any Hardware/Software Based Noise Cancellation. Verdict :-. Good for entry level market but not recommended unless your budget is INR 1000 or below.. (during offers these tend to be available for INR 800 also)

name: Suhas Gunda
title: Warranty issue
content: I am unable to register for warranty service in their website.

name: ashik mathew
title: Stay away!
content: The mic on this product is of very poor quality.. It keeps echoing and leaves an unpleasant ringing noise for the person on the other end of the phone. On activating the bass mode its a bit better but still has the same issue. It also make some weird noises when nothing is playing on the earphone. I tried replacing the product and the new one i recieved was no different. The sound quality and bass is not that bad when on bass mode. If you are a person who wants an earphone for calling purposes then please do stay away from this product.

name: JINU MAHENDRAN
title: Decent sound with only this downside...
content: Sound quality is best.not for best bass,but still satisfying.the downside I could complain is terrific battery life.it hardly manages when using media like movie.the dual equaliser feature is great but will drain battery life sooner when used for longer periods.normal equaliser is decent in my opinion.. I hope this review will be helpful for someone üòä.thank you.have a good purchasing experience.

name: George Paul
title: Value for money in budget range
content: Pros:. Good product. I doubted in buying at first but once I have bought it I am impressed. Good sound quality. As you higher the volume you will feel the bass. Good bluetooth connectivity. I was able to connect even keeping my phone in different room.. Cons:. *Feeling the battery life is bit low.. *Magnetic attractively is less

name: VNN
title: True to JBL legacy...
content: True to JBL legacy, if you like bass and sound effect... This is for you. If you really want to hear those lower notes find music, then this might not be for you. For the price, I would say its worth it. For an average user this is good buy. Go ahead....

name: Akhilesh Sarasijan
title: Disappointed
content: I thought of giving this a try because its from jbl and i ended up getting disappointed.. Here are few problems i had :-. 1) When i got it had product fault the in built mic wasnt working properly .. 2) Connecting it to my laptop , i get static noise or disturbance after using it for few mins and i have to power it off and then turn it on again. Its really irritating.. 3)i would suggest they add a charger since it doesnt use c type charger .. 4)while connecting it to my phone i dont have issues like i have in laptop.. Overall im really disappointed in the product as i paid Rs899 for a brand i trusted in but ended in a bad way.

name: Mohit A.
title: Value for money
content: Bass is great and dual bass option is great if you love soft lyrical song then normal bass work fine and in deep bass thumping is more but still lyrics are audible but i don't know i am only one or someone also face a problem sometimes that the voice notification of disconnected even after connected and facing a problem at once that voice distorted at after 5 feets but 1-2 time now it works fine i don't know why and what that happens

name: Arindam Singh
title: Go for it when its prize goes down to 1299INR
content: 5-6 hours battery life wen charged full...but it is as committed by the company so I can't say anything to that. While sound quality is good, also looks cool when you put them on . Has adequate range of bluetooth susceptibility. I even sometimes leave my phone at the first floor and roam on some other , still it catches without sound or connectivity loss

name: Satya Prakash
title: Honest review after using 5 days.
content: It is too flexible to stay at place on neck. It slips from neck. Neckband should be such that it don't slip from neck. It goes here and there. It is not comfortable at all. About battery - max 5 hours. No doubt bass is good due to 12 mm driver.. Sound lag of 1.5 sec is seen during playing videos. Overall I recommend boat reckerz 255 over this product. I got disappointed as this product is not returnable. If you are thinking of taking this, I request you to go for another product except this.

name: SK
title: Best bluetooth neckband in this price point
content: I got this in BBD sale at ‚Çπ899. But even if it is priced around 1500-2000 these ahe best.. Sound quality is good way better and louder than boat which I was using. These are very loud so you will never have use at full volume. Hence you get excellent battery backup. Built quality could have been better. Main hilight is bass quality. Bass is very well balanced and has punchy feel to it. For those who don't want excessive bass these have dual equilizer to tune down bass. Mid and high tones are produced good enough. No active noise cancellation. Mic is good. So over all I would say at less than ‚Çπ1800 buy these without any doubt. Thank you.

name: Manish
title: Infinity glide by harman
content: Infinity glide. I think a person who need wireless lead. Can go for it. Idnt listen music on full volume. But ya quite good voice. Amazing deep bass mode. Noise cancellation not up to mark but if you are in home its good. One charge of 2.3hrs lasts up to 5-6 hrs if you use it continuous. Other wise good for music. Not uptomark for watching series. All i can say if you willing to buy boat rockers 255. Go for infinity it is much far better than that

name: Amazon Customer
title: Pretty Average.
content: Average sound quality it will show SBC transmission in Bluetooth options in Developer options. Buttons behave in a random manner some times at times could not flip to dual EQ at times could not invoke G Assistant. So looked too average quality to me given the amount of 1399.

name: Sayandev Nandy
title: Very poor battery life & Bluetooth voice connectivity
content: Please don't buy this product for the below 2 main reasons :. 1. Battery doesn't last for more than 2hrs while listening to music. 2. Very poor build/design, keeps falling off the neck. 3. Bad for using it for talking, the person on the other side would not be able to hear any of your words clearly, there is a constant humming sound.

name: Jith
title: Would serve the purpose.
content: I am using bose noise cancellation ear phones. I bought this for travel purpose. If I compare this with bose, it's like comparing benz to a maruti. This jbl is okay and would serve the purpose. Please don't expect a deep bass and or exceptional quality.

name: Yogesh Jha
title: Recommended - A good product
content: I got it at a price of Rs. 999/- in prime day deal.. A value for money product as it has lot of good things as in :. Dual sound Mode : Normal / Extra Bass. Descent backup : 6 - 7 hours ( played continuously ). LED Notification. Comfortable Ear cushions. And Incredible sound.. It's has a lot of room for improvement but still highly recommended product.. ( Comparison based on mixed usage experience of similar products from REALME & ONE PLUS ).

name: Dev
title: Bluetooth quality is very bad
content: Bluetooth call quality is bad. Voice breaks up frequently. Returned the item when I bought it for the first, thought had issue with Bluetooth. 2nd purchase having same issue. If want to watch movies and listen to songs then it works fine. But not for people who wants to take normal call or whatsapp call.. FOR PEOPLE BUYING THIS FOR ZOOM MEETINGS "DONT BUY THIS". STRICT NO FOR ZOOM CALLS.. Battery back and sound quality is good.. Bluetooth quality is very very poor.. Not sure how this can be fixed. But this is the major issue if your are going for Bluetooth earphone.. I hope my review helps you all.. Developers please work on this ...

name: Amazon Customer
title: The worst product ever
content: i will suggest everyone not to buy this product, its the worst product ever, i am a frequent user of headphones and earphones, i have never got a bluetooth earphones from amazon which has lasted for more than 2 months, trust me on that guys, i have tried boat sony and now this one infinity it dint even last for 15 days these guys they give u attractive discounts but its not worth it and if we want to have the replacement, v cant get in touch with the third party, i went with the riview, and i am way to disappointed, in my opinion guys dont go for it, dont even bother. i would had given negative marking if i had an option.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Nice but have some flaws.
content: It's has slightly over bass in normal mode bass is over powering and in bass mode is not good. Kids like over the top bass but it not give the pure sound.. My old cx180 sound is better than this.. Built quality is super no compromise.. It's flexible and easy to were.. Batter life is also as stated.. Other than extra bass all things are good.. Ear buds are hard i changed it with my cx180 ear buds

name: Jeevan
title: Great for listening but poor while answering calls
content: Excellent while listening to music or any other audio. While answering calls everyone complained that I was not audible and there was a lot of disturbance both in Indoors & Outdoors. Also charging % display didn't correspond to reality. on phone, it showed 60% and then within 20 mins it says battery low and shuts down.

name: SWWAPNIL KAMBLEY
title: Amazing product . Just feel the beat .
content: I am reviewing the product after using it for 3 months .. I use this products for attending calls and to listen music while travelling .. Pros :. - The product quality is really good for its price .. - The sound quality and Bass is good.. - The mic is really good as the receiver can hear your voice clear and sharp .. - It fits in my ear perfectly .. - Has a good battery backup .. Cons :. - The strap slips easily of the neck .. - Can be more stylish .

name: Ravi kanth
title: Good for Music, Need improvement for Voice calls
content: Good for Music, Voice calls are not clear at outdoor environments due to lack of noise cancellation, Deep bass is impressive even in higer volume, no distortion. Though its a Bluetooth v5.0, there is no Aptx hd which is very important feature for quality music lovers, we my expect in future Varients becoz its infinity from JBl. Overall its a Value for money. Who gives priority for Voice calls this Varient is not recommended. Battery backup is just ok.

name: Subrata Sarkar
title: Design is poor need to change
content: Sound is good it's come original 12mm speaker sound very loud and sound quality is average but problem in design company has no idea what the wire length size it's too long it's not good if u don't have with this wire size then u go for it it's good

name: KU
title: Syncing issues, not able to listen at full volume, magnets are of no use
content: Not much of use. Mangets are not serving the purposes as even a soft touch or movement is detaching when not in use. Also, the length is quite long to hang around the neck all the day. Battery is good. Sound is okay if you don't go to the fullest level. On full volume everything is same very distorted no lows no mids. I am not liking it. And main thing sometime I noticed some lagging and due to that video and audio lip syncing lost many times for my smart TV and mobile too.

name: Farheen Qureshi
title: An average buy
content: I appreciate the exchange response i received from amazon i got a quick replacement of defective device. However as I had the same Bluetooth which i brought offline and lost the same i went ahead for this purchase but to my disappointment this time the wires have gone short in length plus the battery seems to be increased in size the overall appearance looks bad due to short neck wires as compared to the same device brought offline. This confused me whether offline is a better buy or company decided to compromised on quality.

name: Nikhil bhagwat
title: More than best for its price
content: Ive been using them for a month now, and i wont lie to you its really justice in fact more than that to its price. The bass quality is really nice sound quality is more than nice. The vass mode really works.. And the Battery OMG its REALLY long all you need to do is charge it up and you'll be fine through the day.. BUTTTT yes there is but at lowest of its sound setting you will hear some "pshhhhhhhhh" kind of sound and IT WILL RUIN YOUR EXPERIENCE for sure IT IS SO BAD AT LOWEST SOUND SETTING ngl it is.. Other than it's more than worth of its price

name: ImJ
title: Good for music and calls, avoid for gaming and movies
content: noticeable latency / lag during gaming and occasional latency during video playback. Good sound quality, feature rich and good value for money. Comfort depends on ear anatomy. I personally am not comfortable with in ear design. Love the color combination and built quality.

name: NANCY
title: Get more money and buy something else with good battery life
content: Guys if you are going to use it from morning till night. By use I mean connected to your phone watching some YouTube vids or some calls. You have to charge this more than two times. All the other things such as sound good noise cancellation is negligible. So just decent you can spend more and get something that have good battery life

name: Frixes Peyoli
title: Decent earphones what u can get at this price point.
content: Overall. Quality of the product is really good, got it 100% charged out of the box, so I tought of doing a battery backup/drain test and it worked for 6hr 30min ( *7hr what they claim) and that's pretty close.. and the audio quality is excellent... Cons. *It would have been awesome if it was build out of something like a tangle free cable and aluminium or a metal switch panel.. *Quality of the switch units looks a bit odd gives a cheap plastic feel and feedback.. *No Auto turn on/off magnetic functions like what some competition offers.. *Ready to pair/connected/disconnected blah blah blah (feels like some local shit what u get from the streets)

name: Nikhil Kamath
title: Reliable Product
content: Coming from the JBL brand, these earphones have a really good sound quality.. The mic on the other had is not that great as it catches a lot of background noise.. Overall, great product for listening to music while jogging/running/cycling. But for taking calls, not the best.

name: ARAVIND
title: Big driver case, hard ear buds
content: Headphone is good. But there is a small irritation in my year because of the bigger driver. And the ear buds are not very good. I am also using a boat headphone(bassheads 225). Its ear budds are awsome. So i replaced jbl earbuds with boat. Now its very good at noice isolation.. While connected with two devices the audio will get delayed. It is so much irritating while watching youtube and other videos.

name: sagar charde
title: Its good to have, but Need improvment for battery life.
content: Good Points:. 1. Sound was good as per price.. 2. Battery work for longer.. 3. Noise cancellation is good.. Bad points:. 1. Ear phone work fine for few days, but after that it is getting automatically power off. I had to charge it for longer, then it works for 10 mins and again it gets ppwer off automacally. Now it is not even working for 10 mins as well. I cannt even use it now.. 2. When connecting to first laptop, then to mobile, its not working properly, audio get cut in between.

name: Prem
title: Not worth buying this , realme rs-299 earphones work same
content: Base quality is not as aspected , surely from jbl bt at this range you got nothing .... rs-299 realme wired earphones work same as this piece of........... Also you can't play Pubg with this earphone because delay in sound .... This is only for music ü•∫..... This time jbl disappointed me .....

name: ranjith
title: Poor product
content: Battery does not work properly, one minute it shows 60% battery remaining and next minute you get batter low warning.. Other times device turns off within a minute of battery low warning at 30%.. Sound is only Bass.. Not value for money.

name: Fahim Ahmed
title: Not upto the mark
content: One very important thing which you all should know, this product doesn't support dual in audio, i.e., you cannot hear the media sound if you're on call. Basically, for gamers, you cannot hear in game sounds if you are using discord or any other app to talk among yourselves. Secondly, after 1momth of usage, my product is causing problems. the left earpiece has stopped working. I recommend not to go for this product.

name: Balachandar
title: Great bang for the buck.
content: A nice, rich sound quality with the right amount of bass without sounding boomy. Sound quality well exceeds the price.. I deducted 1 star for its. Neckband is slightly thick cable that doesn't hold it's place, especially when lying down. And I personally had trouble with in-ear fit and the loops above is too small hold against my ear.

name: Satya S.
title: DONT BUY! HORRIBLE SOUND
content: Horrible pair of buds this. I dont understand how it has this high ratings. I used to buy those cheap 100-200 rs earphones 10 years ago. Since then I have ordered atleast 20-30 buds in this price range. And this is the worst of them all. It aftually has the soundscape of the 100-200rs earphones. Honestly, there is no sound at all. It is really hard to explain. It is certainly bassy, but it isnt enjoyable either . Go for Boats. It is 10x better for the price range. Its not even JBL. It is from their sister so MISLEADING PRODUCT PAGE.

name: Akhilesh S.
title: Good sound, bad battery.
content: I like it's form factor and audio base and quality. However battery is very bad, charging time is more and it does not last much, even in stand-by mode it looses lot of charge. There are far better option even in less price. If sound is priority then go for it.

name: Swapna
title: Boat is much better product when you compare with this.
content: Utterly useless. I don't know how people are giving best rating for this item. Bass not at all good. You can't enjoy music not more than 5min. Same price range boat is delivering better quality in terms of sound and product. Don't waste your money and time. After using it for 5min I have changed my mind to return it. True feedback.

name: Shubham Kumar
title: Product quality
content: Product quality is very good . The sound quality is very good especially the bass is splendid and the deep bass is awsome. Noise cancellation also very good. Especially Bass headers recommended. Audio quality is excellent, during calls there is no lack or nor any type of disturbance I face. You can easily roll the earphone in your pocket and also it doesn't scramble like other wire headphones. Over all the build quality, the sound, noise cancellation, no lack in calls, audio quality is up to the mark. I love the product.

name: ANIRBAN SARKAR
title: Good product! Loved it!
content: Well this is not a professional review.. Sound is great, bass lovers will like it.. Battery back up is pretty decent around 7-8 hours.. Gets charged pretty quick.. Bluetooth connectivity is good and lag free.. Light and portable, can put in your jeans pocket.. Pretty good under Rs. 1500. Go for it!

name: Kindle Customer
title: Read this before you buy
content: *Read before you buy*. The sound quality is good but only sound quality is good.. The length of neck band is short and one earpiece keeps on getting out of the ear everytime you bend right or left .. Earphones automatically disconnect from the phone while playing music and we have to reconnect it again to listen through which is a big quality check and this cannot be expected from a company those who are pioneers in this field.. I would not recommend this product to anyone

name: Ankur Verma
title: The beast is here grab it üíØ
content: This earphone is the best bluetooth earphone available in the market right now. This will only cost u ‚Çπ1299 which is fair enough from the makers of Harmon JBL.. ¬∞ i dont write much bcoz I have nothing to do with looks and feel all it matters the sound which is best from its competitors like boat and boult. ¬∞when it comes to sound boat rockerz 255 can't even come close to this bcoz boat focuses more on bass and the mids and lows sound creepy though here you'll get enough amount of bass but also the mids and lows of the song sounds good... U can feel the thump on deep mode eq

name: Himanshu
title: good headphone for normal but lacked in bass
content: talking about the voices particularly they are good and clear but lacking in bass even in deep bass mode(EQ), i would recommend to those who would like normal music. Lows are good but high do not produce that oomph in your ears.. For bass lovers i wont recommend go for any of the boat poduct.. *Battery backup is good gives you 6 hrs normally. *range is also good. *allows to connect more than one device. *sometimes loose connection on its own IDK why. *magnets are not that strong to keep the ear piece in contact while running

name: Divya
title: Bass is poor otherwise product is good
content: Sound quality and noise cancellation is good but Bass quality is very poor. Sometime I wonder if makers really understand what does bass really mean??? So product is worth buying fir calling / talking but for music it's waste of money.

name: Tom
title: Bang for the Bucks
content: I have a glide 100 BT earphone and it is value for money( got it for 1K). Glide 120 didn't had many reviews when i bought it. I trusted the brand name and a few good reviews.. Sound quality is very good. Deep bass mode is more than adequate in this price range.. BT range is also good( walls do pose some problems. Line of Sight range is more than 150m). I got it for 1.2K and @ that price this earphone is an absolute steal.. Battery life is 5.30 - 6 hours( deal-breaker for some folks). Use only 1A charger ( as per manual). No lags while watching Movies ( MX player), YouTube videos and gaming ( PUBG).. One drawback: earphone cables are not flatüò£ ( cheaper gilde 100 has got flat cables). Flat cables don't twist / tangle up or break easily.

name: Abhijeet Chauhan
title: Value for money earphone
content: The earphones are actually worth the amount. Got it for 850. The sound quality is good. The build quality is sturdy, the wires are of good thickness not like the cheap ones. The magnetic ear pieces makes it easy to lock on neck. Battery back up is about 6-8 hours on high volumes. The buttons are little hard though.

name: PROTIM Maitra
title: Superb sound quality in this range
content: Harman by JBL as the name suggest u dont look for anywhere else.. AMAZING sound quality,deep bass, dual equaliser [normal + deep bass mode], IPX5 WATERPROOF, magnatic dubs recharge is also fast, bluetooth 5 super fast connect etc. I BOUGHT this on lightening deal and you should too.

name: Sanju Njr.
title: Fantabulous product!! Thanks to JBL & Amazon.
content: Awesome product from JBL. Sound quality perfect!! Superb Bass.. Truly sync with music.. but not noisy. I have been using it for more than 4 months now. On a single charge I am using it for office calls and music approx 5-7 hours on a daily basis. Connectivity is flawless. No cons observed till date. Thanks JBL and Amazon for providing the customers this wonderful sound experience. Packaging and tracking details are upto the mark. Delivered in 3 days to me. Amazingly fast delivery. Recommend it to all. Must buy gear!! Do not hesitate.. Just go for it

name: Snehalata Pradhan
title: Good one. Recommended.
content: The earphone is pretty good. I had previously used another in-ear Bluetooth one but was quite disappointed with that soud quality. This one is good. No connection lag, noise cancellation is also good, the bass is proper.. The battery is quite good (Writing this after using 3-4 datys).. The only negative point i could figure out is that the band is little shorter in length compared to other similar earphone bands. So if you bend to one side, it feels like the band is shifting to that side and you have to adjust it again on your neck.

name: sangh
title: In low price , a very good product
content: A good product at a very good price... Good packaging. Good Plastic quality. Light weight. Back up approx 6.5 hours. Sound quality is 8/10. Those who need a basic product with quality and less time usage can buy it without any worries... I looked at a few earphones... Sony and realme I found good but they were for 1900 and 1700 .. they offered few more features because you are paying more... In 1300 , this product is giving you basic features, but if you need more functions then you can go for sony

name: Sanket
title: Avg product, drags frm behind
content: No issues with sound quality, bass, volume in its price . Could hv been better, if it's realy a sister concern of JBL. Big issue is the neck line portion is very light...unable to sustain the wt of the battery bumper and gets dragged to one side...often hanging from around the ear. Pretty nagging . Battery back up is avg

name: Amazon Customer
title: Old stock product stop working in 2-3 months
content: I bought this product in September 20 in 1299.00. now the price is 1099 in Dec. I am facing some issue when listening music the bluetooth connection is breaking though my mobile is in my hand. Don't know why it's available in so less price not good I think it's all very old stock friends. I l suggest not to buy this product if it's available in 999 in few days. You will be busy to return and receive the product once it start the same problem I am facing . Very frustrating right now 1299 rs. All in vain.

name: Sunny
title: Unable to register for warranty
content: Giving one star because unable to register product. This particular product is not available in the list of products on website for registration purpose to avail warranty. I think ANY ELECTRONIC IS USELESS WITHOUT WARRANTY.

name: Vishwanath R.
title: Disappointing battery life üòî
content: Sound, bass, noise cancelling was perfect. Battery is disappointing with 4 to 6 hours (according to my experience), when fully charged. Other headsets/earphones can easily do 12 to 20 hours. Perfect for gym, as it is sweat resistant, I tried and had no problem. Overall i am happy with the sound quality but felt they should not have cut corners at battery

name: siddharth
title: A non wire jump model please l.
content: A harder, longer and a heavier neckband could have been better. It's like the wires are copying your emotions .. you jump they jump, and slowly slouch over oneside. The sound quality is good, but battery is just 2 hours on 80% volume. So price wise, it is good I got it for 999.

name: GTS
title: Good product, value for money, slow charging,  less duration of charge
content: The product has decent sound quality and is value for money.. The charge however lasts barely a day of intermittent use. It also charges very slowly and we aren't supposed to use the regular chargers (max permissible: 1.2A, 5V chargers). Most of the time we have to charge using the laptop's USB port.. The magnet also is a slightly weak but overall doesn't cause much discomfort.. Apart from the charging, this is a satisfactory device.

name: vishwanath
title: No 1 product
content: Received this product today, after using for few hours the only review I can write for now is wow....... I am loving it, had so many doubts at the time of order, but as of now I can say that it's a great product, extremely happy...thanks JBL n Flipkart.. for giving this great product at a great price.. n lastly if I will find any problems related to this product after using it for few more months will surely update my review but I don't think that I need to as it's a genuine product of JBL. I HAVE PURCHASED 1199/-

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not for workout
content: Positive : Sound quality is good. Easy blutooth connectivity. Product built is also good. Call handling is also good. There is no issue with call quality. It works well in at least 8 meters.. Negative:. The earbuds fall while you are doing running ,. ,jogging, or even slight warm up. Even after installing the smallest it fall from the ear during even Surya Namaskar.. Final verdict: product . Product is good but only E for listening music but it does not suitable if your purpose is to use this for workout

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not Worth it .....
content: writing this review after 5 months of usage. DON'T go for it. The price may seem attractive but it is unable to handle even the basic earphone support during calls. It will show you connected but no audio will come during calls. you have to reconnect it multiple times to get it done. The audio quality is also not up to expectations. sometimes while listening to music you can hear a weird breaking noise of wires and you need to again disconnect and reconnect to fix that. Really I am disappointed in JBL after this product.

name: praveen
title: Cant be used for calls. Microphone is really really feeble.
content: sound is good, value or money for listening to music.. Mic is pathetic, you cant cofortably make calls with this. You need to hold the mic close to your mouth and still people complaint from other side.. Features are good and decent. No complaints on the funcationalities.. Battery backup is less, and also it takes a lot of time to charge.. bottom line, buy it only for listening to music not for making calls.

name: Akshay Kumar Reddy
title: Awesome product...Just go for itüëçüëç
content: I was using JBL tune bt110 for last 1 year and this one is better than jbl itself perfectly fits in ear which will doesn't make feel u are wearing it and also doesn't let's external noice and sound quality is wonderful compared to Boat build quality is also good the major advantage for me is it's flexible cable which can be easily put in pocket as neck banded ones cannot be folded as get's damaged... Ear bud is also metallic very premium feels like....Go for itüëçüëç

name: Ayush D.
title: Gave up in just 5 months disappointed üòû
content: READ THE FOLLOWING BEFORE BUYING.. Pros - It has awesome bass you can feel the shiver when the bass drops. Noise cancellation is good and the product is comfortable to ear.. Cons - It's build is not good. Neckband moves too much when used during workout.. In comparison to its bass trebble and alternative are too low, even equaliser won't help.. After use of exactly 5 months they have stopped working it won't on at all even after keeping it on charge for 1 whole hour mostly used it during my workouts.

name: Amit Rajan
title: Battery life sucks, everything else is best
content: Battery hardly lasts 5 hours even on 50% volume. Stand-by time is very low. Charging time is quite high with 1 Amp charger. 2 Amp shouldn't be used.. Can't use while charging.. Quality of music good compared to price. Buy only if you have limited use of headphones.

name: Vicky
title: Complaint Horrible
content: This product has a very badly connectivity. I can't replace because I threw the box because I trusted that it's JBL Brand everythng will be fine. It automatically gets disconnected if the mobile is in my hand or pocket it gets disconnected. I was give interview automatically it got disconnected and it was so embarrassing.. I don't know why JBL is manufacturing such products

name: Sumith
title: Nice Product but not suitable for small ears holes
content: I am using this for attending my office call mainly. I can‚Äôt see any noise cancellation or filter. Sound quality is good and the product quality is also looks good.only problem is that it‚Äôs not that much suitable for small ears.it won‚Äôt fit properly and sometimes it push out. Other than this the product is good

name: kartheek
title: One and only worthless product of Harman
content: I brought infinity glide 120 for 849 INR. Now I regret my decision to buy this product. Previously I used wired earphones Soundmagic ES19s and House of Marley EM-JE041-DN. Glider 120 is inferior to both sound magic and House of Marley when comparing sound quality and bass. Infact it's an insult to both Soundmagic and House of marley when one tried comparing them with Glider. It's better if we didn't speak about the Bluetooth and microphone. In my openion glide 120 is a one and only worthless product of Harman.

name: Mallikarjuna Shivalingajjar
title: Go for it!!
content: Bluetooth range is great, connectivity is fast and stable, sound quality is OK, Bass is optimum, love its options, awesome product in its price range, very happy for it!! Hope it's durable since it's made in China although it's packed in California by Harman!! And after a month of using it, I should say it is the best! Its durable! No compromise in sound quality and bass! Guys go for it!!

name: Prashanth Kumar
title: Not suitable for running.
content: The ear phones comes off the ears while running which is annoying.. I tried all 3 sizes of ear plugs, none of them stuck my ears while running.. Apart from this everything is ok.

name: Sounak
title: Decent product at this price
content: Lightweight and sleek, Sound quality is decent. Compared to Boat Rockerz 255, the bass is a bit better (when deep Bass eq is turned on).. To turn on Deep Bass eq, press Vol + and Vol - buttons together.

name: Vikas Sharma
title: Not satisfied with the product and it's stopped working within warranty period.
content: I have bought this product on 6th July 2020 and within a warranty period, it has stopped working.. I am facing an issue with battery backup and the worst part is that being a tag line of Harmon their customer care/response is hopeless.. I have purchased this item only because it was available on Amazon. If this is the way Amazon is doing the due diligence of its supplier then we should go for offline purchase only at least we can meet the supplier in person and seek his help.. Can anyone help me with how to claim a warranty?. Regards, Vikas

name: Surya
title: One side of earpiece not working in about a month.
content: Everything was working fine for about a month and suddenly one side earpiece started causing some breaking sound and now totally there is no sound from the left ear piece. Waste of time. Called regarding service , they say I have to go to some place and give these earphones for service , I mean even in this pandemic situation there is no pickup drop service given to customers from JBL side , Worst product and worst service JBL . Pls guys stay away from these cheap earphones.

name: Fasal Rahman
title: Premium product in a fare price
content: The sound quality is outstanding, the dual equaliser works great.4 star because i got the product in a crumbled box, also minor scratches where there in the earbud.

name: Hardik Shukla
title: Good one. You can go for it. But read detail reviews...
content: Overall, good product... I'm happy with this.. Based on price of it, battery backup is okay bcoz I generally used for calling only; it want next recharging after 2 days. But if you use it for movie or a song, you have to do charging atleast once a day, depends on use...

name: Sam
title: Good battery backup, n excellent sound quality
content: Best sound quality, as always jbl is known for it no talks about it, battery lasted for around 9-10 hrs on normal mode, sound cancellation is awesome, don't use it while driving or riding, if done use on single ear, its still loud n clear..

name: Raj Bahadur
title: Super Sound
content: Earlier I purchased JBL T205BT, that was also good according to the performnce, but Infinity Glide 120 is better in all position, it has better sound quality, better battery life, overall it's best earphone under budget of 1.5k

name: Vishnu Datta Sastry
title: Very good
content: My children have been using this since six months for their online classes. I am also using this for my long phone calls. Absolutely good and working fine in all ways.. Out of two I purchased, one is fine with a U shape, other one received without any shape, it is like a straight thread, which is not fitting on my neck for a long time.. Other than this I really don't have any complaints on this product.

name: Savanth S
title: Incredibly worth the price.
content: Sound quality is really superb, absolutely fantastic for the price. Superb sound quality and clarity even at max volume. Just opened the package and its working fine. I was using apple earpods, sound quality is gud in apple earpods but the material is worst, easily gets damaged near the audio pin for just normal use. Therefore, i decided to spend money for jbl instead od apple earpods.. Have to use it and see further. This review is just after opening the package and listening to few songs.

name: H V Singh
title: Earphone doesn't works. Connection and Battery Issues.
content: Probably one of the worst products I have ever purcahsed on Amazon. Had gifted it to my mom. It was only recently she tried it and lo, behold. The piece doesn't works properly. It will frequently disconnect without any rhyme or reason. The battery capacity fluctuates widely. One moment it shows 70% and the next it is down to 10%. Few minutes later it rises to 40% then 20% and back to 70%. Wtf? Unfortunately can't even return to Amazon as the return date has passed.

name: Roshan
title: Truly fabulous
content: The deep bass mode is truly insane the microphone does a okay job.... The battery life is pretty good for a days work especially for students like attending online classes up-to 6 hours a day and the connectivity range of the neckband is around 6-7 metres to be honest and it doesn't work through walls. The colour combination is good but the earbuds have a standard inner colour of yellow which do no suit with red neckband. Worth the price and best among other headphones in this price range

name: KSHITIJ
title: Nice product.
content: First time I purchased a bluetooth earphone and it is definitely worth the cost.. Features :. pros :. long battery backup. good noise cancellation. bass is good. sound quality on a call is good.. cons :. delayed audio while watching videos on youtube or other streaming platforms.. doesn't always connect to the mobile on it's own after switching it on.. ear fit might be problem to some.. overall a nice product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not good
content: These headphones stopped working after a month, it might be a defective piece but nvm. Ok so coming to the point after using it for a month, this is what i think:-. Value for money - 3.5/5. Sound Quality - 3/5. Weight - 3.5/5. Battery life - 3.5/5. Bass - 4/5. Durability - 0/5 (Its according to me, urs might be still working but mine stopped working). i overall rate it 64/100. I think you shouldnt buy it coz i didnt expect a product like this from jbl :(

name: RudraRaj Panchal
title: Very Impressive For This Price Point ... Excellent Job By Infinity
content: Build Quality-4/5. Bass-3.5/5. Vocal-4/5. Highs-3.5/5. Fitting-4.5/5. Battery Life-4.5/5. Connectivity-4.5/5. Treble-4/5. Noise Isolation-3.5/5. Overall Sound Quality-4/5

name: RASHMIN PAREKH
title: Excellent qulity product in budget.
content: excellent durable product. good battery life and sturdy cable.it sounds little more base frequency but i adjusted from my samsung music player equalizer so i get smooth sound. i will recommend if u r looking a budget Bluetooth ear phone. Thanks Amazon.

name: Ankit Dutta
title: Awful Product
content: Awful product. Sometimes the Bluetooth doesn't connect properly, also it is filled with noise while calling. The sound is adequate while listening to music, but while calling the sound is just awful and is filled with noise. Also, while on a call if i try to listen to something else, let's say for example an YouTube video or some song or something, the sound won't come out properly. Overall, i should give it negative ratings. I will never suggest this product to anyone. Absolutely awful.

name: jatinder
title: Duplicate product-Dont buy
content: Got this product today only. -This product not registered on Harmanaudio.com, hence no warranty. -Bluetooth gives distortion in audio, you may have to restart multiple times to hear clear sound. Don't buy this, better buy realme or Boat.

name: Supu
title: Disappointed headphones
content: This headphones doesn't have good sound quality, very poor call quality- while on call static sound will come and even music sounds muddy, bass is good but if the sound quality is muddy then wats the use of having good bass. I replaced it and 2nd one which I got also had same issue.. Conclusion: if u r music lover or going to use for calls then this is not the headphone for u.

name: Ranjith Kumar
title: JBL infinity Glide performance
content: As it's from JBL the quality of the product is good. Reg noise cancellation, if we attend office calls, meeting from a calm room or private room, it goes well. As mentioned by someone in the review, the frequency is 20 to 20khz, so mic will capture disturbance signal obviously. Anyway, it's a Nice product.

name: Sagar dev
title: Worst product
content: Plz don't buy this product because after 3 month one side of this earphone will stop working just like other cheap earphones so my qn is why we have this 1300 ruppes for this totally waste and the saddest part is that customer service support is just very very poor they won't accept your earphone for replacement without any proper reason service centre number doesn't work email them but nothing happens just the worst product ever buyed.

name: Santhoshk
title: Very Good for Music but not for calls
content: Got the product in Prime Day sale.Buy this if the purpose is for Music.Call Quality is not that great.. The initial one which I received was damaged I suppose as call quality was very very bad.. Got a replacement and this is ok types for call.. But again given the price tag ,guess its good for music only

name: sanchi singh
title: ü•∫
content: I'm using it for like a month now .. just in a month music quality has been reduced and .. some annoying noise is coming with music ... They are not working properly . üò≠. They just good bass .. but what do I do with bass .. when lyrics are not clear and .. some annoying noise is coming with music ..

name: Arup Das
title: Lovely
content: By jbl series this earphone easy to use, comfortable when you wear it. The sound quality nice & clear, bass also good. Fill the sound awesome at 80% of volium. In fact at this price compare with others then it is better. Go for it

name: swapnil d nagare
title: Worst Product by JBL, PATHETIC EXPERIENCE
content: This JBL infinity dont produce quality sounf neither Bluetooth connection is stable.. Everytime this gets disconnected (not disconnected but an error due to which you can not listen or talk on phone call) its annoying as you need to switch off and on it for several intervals.. Dont look at price, go for any other JBL product but don't buy this Infinity Glide Series.. Pathetic experience !!!

name: Ankit
title: Comfort level is lil low, battery is lil down
content: So first thing is its not that comfortable. Battery life is okish upto 50 % after 40 it plumet quick. Bass is good but sound quality is lil low. During video recording via phone the mic on this headphone doesnot work. I thought it was only this one but u have to buy a mic with blue tooh connectivity. I guess thats a bummer. But comfort level is lil low sound could have been better. Bass is good.

name: Javed n.
title: Music lovers this is for you ‚ù§Ô∏è
content: Treat for music lovers üíó. Fits perfectly in ears .. am a music lover and also a. big fan of Harman family . I have been using Harman kardon onyx studio 4 / boat earphones / JBL / Google home but I tell you the bass in this earphone is way better than every other earphone no problem in battery backup this is the best earphone untill now I have used I would say this is studio 4 of earphone... perfect ..!!! Loved it !!!

name: Mitesh
title: Lead in this category bt wireless earphone
content: Sound quality is one of the best than others...even at maximum volume it sounds clean...bass quality also good...build quality also nice...just one thing to mention it works fine with mobiles but with smart tv it lossing its bt connection.. Battery last long.

name: Royston Ross
title: Battery & Usage
content: 1.The battery backup is poor, if u are using it for whole day, the battery will last for 6-7hrs and you have to put them on charger again.. 2. The Neck band is flexible like a soft wire, hence it's gets slip from your neck everytime and you have to adjust it. If you don't observe it then there is a chance of getting lost.. 3. Rest of the features , like the sound quality, bass, BT connectivity and volume button are good.

name: Saksham9888
title: Amazing Sound Quality...!!!
content: sound quality is amazing, i have other high quality earphones as well, you can't compare quality with very high end earphones like akg or sennheiser, but at this price you are not going to better sound experience, easily comparable with jbl and much more premium than boat or skull candy.. for gaming there is a slight delay, but again at this price you can't get better.. will test longevity of these earphones and update the review.

name: Ram
title: A bit disappointed but does it's job.
content: Bought this for ‚Çπ900. The sound quality is average, not up to the mark. Expected more for its brand name (Harman) but it's just like any other product at this price bracket. Battery is also average, lasts around 5hrs at 80% volume (In Amazon's specification column it's shown as 120 mAh, but inside the box it's 85 mAh, so be aware). It's flexible and easy to carry in your pocket. Built quality is good enough.

name: Manzoor
title: Do not fall for JBL branding. Product is not good enough for the money.
content: Pros- Very good build quality. Base is above average. Battery backup is as per specification.. Cons- Mic quality is worst. I have returned my order as I could not take any calls. Vocals suppressed. Ear piece is very bulky and heavy.. Trust me it is not a good product to go for. Do not fall for JBL branding.

name: Nagaraj
title: Nice bluetooth earphones
content: The first product which I got was a bit defective it had a faint buzz going on in the background which would be quite disturbing during meeting but I got a replacement within a day.. U can shift from deep bass to normal mode by pressing the volume buttons simultaneously.. Sound quality is amazing,Bluetooth also seems fine.The best part is the build quality.

name: Kunal Luthade
title: Real or fake that is the question?
content: Sound quality and all is awesome,. But I faced issue with the product while microsoft teams call.. My voice was not able to hear by the othe person.. And felt as fake product as the neckband was too flexible.. Same product purchased by my colleague got hard neckband which is not flexible.... Sound quality, noise cancellation, bass quality is really very good but please thing for the above two comments...

name: Vishnupradeep
title: Poor product quality!!!!
