content: The product is only an average qualit of performance. The major issue is it is getting disconnected very often. While you speak or listen music it will disconnect. Seems like the product quality also very poor. This is the second time I am experience an issue with Harman product earlier one is JBL. The built quality is not reliable. Think before you buy.

name: Swagata Mondal
title: Disappointed. Right side not working after 1 month use.
content: Initially, I was happy with the purchase since it was meeting my daily needs like attending work calls and all.. But just after one month use, the right side stopped working. Very disappointing. Good that I didn't give review immediately after the purchase. Otherwise, that would have been very misleading. However, one of my colleagues is using this same headphone since last couple of months and its working perfectly! I think I got duplicate product maybe?!

name: Ijas Ahamed
title: Amazing sounds for the price..
content: I definitely love this thing.. wonderful for the price..the major attraction of the product is sound quality and that's worth of the price.. excellent bass and sound quality mmno fading even in deep bass mod..not break..just wonderful..just started using..so still haven't checked with the battery quality..but this is not so good for gaming as there is a half a sec lag..call mic quality is not the best.

name: Tushar Ranjan
title: About ‚ÄºÔ∏è Sounds & Battery
content: glide 120 have very nice sound quality i used many Bluetooth earphones but if i talk about sound its awesome but but „ÄΩÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è the battery is not give 7hr its give 4hr of charge and when you leations with full volume its totally give 3 to 2 hour of battery life and other thing is ‚ö†Ô∏èwhen used on/off the earphone its no vibrated ‚ö†Ô∏èif you bay for sound quality only its very good choice for you üëà

name: Amazon Customer
title: Overall Good
content: Pros : Great for bass lovers. Excellent sound quality. Design is good & fit in ears.. Cons: 1) battery charge can stand only for 7 hours of continuous usage.. 2) audio play won't get stop if headphone magnets attached to each other.

name: Utkarsh
title: Best buy ever
content: I rarely write reviews, but this product particularly forced me to write a review because it's so awesome...... Don't get double thoughts, buy it straightaway without any doubt

name: JAYWANT PANDHARE
title: Misleading Product Description
content: Product dont have any brand connection, especially its not JBL nor similar to JBL's quality. JBL just acquired HARMAN, and this is being totally misleading branding seller trying sell through.

name: Fiazudheen
title: worthless to buy
content: Sound Quality is very bad, MIC is utter most worst. Initially i thought i received a faulty product after getting a replacement the problem remains the same. never go for this product not even try, Didnt expect this bad Quality product from JBL

name: Amazon Customer
title: Decent bluetooth earphones but with distorted sound
content: The good. Colour looks good. Three sizes of ear plugs available but neither for too well. We chose what fitted better than others. Decently priced. Bass is good when listening to songs. Pairing is fast and easy. The bad. Distortion in sound. Cable is clumsy, could have been made shorter. No adapter for charging in the box, only usb charging cable provided

name: Bhanupratap patel
title: You can buy u will not face any problem with these earphones
content: Overall experience good .if finding wireless earphone in bugdet u can go for it . Don't view many reviews just buy it bcz if u see reviews they goes very deep and there is no sense of those are they are talking about they just confusing .. One more thing if you searching for high quality audio ,bass, noise cancellation ,then go for truely wireless i.e earpods

name: Amrit
title: Best Audio in market.
content: Best in Market. This is my fourth earphone I have oneplus bullets, boat rockerz 255, realme buds and this one. This one has the best audio quality than other three. If you want audio quality go for this..... But my main concern is noise cancellation. This thing has minimal noise cancellation.

name: Himanshu solanki
title: Don't just go by the JBL Harman branding
content: Don't just go by JBL or Harman branding, the quality of this product is not at par, mic quality is poor and one needs to shout to be audible by the listener, this product has connectivity issues and once the battery is half then it will start to lag while watching HD videos, bass sounds like a 200 rs earphones, overall it doesn't worth the money. Please don't buy this you will be disappointed ‚òπÔ∏è

name: Amazon Customer
title: Product is a joke and just plan horrible
content: I am just tired of returning and getting a replacement of this product and its just turns out product is just junk.. Bought during the sale and an absolute waste of money.. The microphone DOES NOT work at all. Regardless of what you do, the audio on a call is always an issue and no one can ever hear me.. The usb slot to charge is clumsy, you almost end up tearing the cover to insert the charging cable

name: Sunil B.
title: bad in quality
content: the n120 glide is only rs 100 diff but far better than this . this product is very cheap in quality, the packing n every thing very bad dont buy this one go for n120 glide in other platforms

name: Vishwas TN
title: Poor battery and noise cancellation
content: The product is well built and is easy to carry in your pocket.. The base is good when you turn on deep base mode otherwise there is no base at all.. Battery life is very poor it lasts 6hrs at 60-70% volume.. There is no noise cancellation. While talking to my friend he told me he could hear the noise more than my voice.. Please consider this

name: Anil
title: Decent product!
content: First time I am ordering bluetooth earphones and infinity (JBL) didn't disappoint. Came in a day early with good packaging. Sound quality is good for the price range, smooth earplugs and easy to use for first time user. Noice cancellation is okay given the price, connectivity over distance could have better. Need to check regarding quality of battery and longevity. All in all a decent product!!

name: vikas patel
title: All good bit build quality is not .
content: Sound is good but i felt that the speaker quality is not good. While putting in ear the earpbone makes a plastic noise like the speaker is pressed.i doibt it ll work for longer time period

name: Sunil Diwan
title: Very poor quality
content: In case you are looking out for good quality bluetooth earphones then this is the wrong place - very poor build, very poor and distorted reception - no sign of outside noise cancellation.

name: ABHISHEK KUMAR
title: Not Expected
content: Not sure if this is actually JBL or they have now been manufacturing such below-par products. Sound quality is a major issue with this, works fine at times but definitely not consistent. There's quite a bit of disturbance. Don't know if this is just with one product or others also faced the same. Would recommend you research before purchasing.. EDIT: (Replacement ordered no returns, will let you know if it they replace it with a acceptable product.)

name: Ram swaroop
title: Not satisfied.
content: Boat rocker 255 is way better than this in many aspects... The neck surrounding wire is so irritating the earphones move away over to ur shoulder.... No proper warning of battery low ... Don't get connected immediately one on unlike like boat roackers 255... Over all I regret buying this over boat roackers 255 2nd time.

name: Arshad N.
title: Good Quality Product by Harman-JBL
content: JBL is providing good quality product. Length of neck band is perfect, not short, not long. Ear buds fit just fine. Perfectly audible during phone call. Mic works good. Battery backup is about 6hours. Any micro USB can charge it. Need more improvement in sound quality and battery backup. I got it in INR1299/- but it should come under INR 1000/-

name: Tanya Rigzin
title: Degraded quality compared to what they manufactured sometime back
content: My brother had purchased the same earphones earlier and it came with a firm yet soft neck support band but mine is wrinkly without a defined curve. Also, in my earphones it doesn't show a green or blue light once fully charged, it keeps on showing red light. I don't know if they're faulty or made like that. Sound quality is good but not great.

name: tuhin mukherjee
title: A budget headphone with good noise quality but has serious issues while using mic.
content: Good battery life and sound quality however the wire around the neck is too flexi to hold it in place - particularly if you are involved in any activity.. Mic is bad as most of the times the person on the other side will not be able to hear u properly. Definitely dont recommend this set for calls.

name: UJJWAL JANJAL
title: Best in class..
content: I have been using it for like more than a week and are flawless with good battery backup and the Bass is also good as compared to other in this price range. Only thing is that no where on the box it is written JBL or anything. Others it's good with maximum everything. Go for it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best wireless earphones in this range and trustworthy make by Harman
content: After thorough contemplation, I bought this earphone and just started to test it with some music and trust me it wont disappoint. It has a great bass with better quality output (though it is like 95% compared to high volume), Good Active Noise Cancellation, Good fit, Nice yellow color.. Overall a good start.. Will update again after 2 weeks.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Average buy
content: Its an average product vis-a-vis its cost. The style, sound quality and all other features are normal but below expectation as i have used few other branded wireless headphones in similar price segment. Overall its average buy and i would suggest to go for some other brand instead of this one...

name: Sarat_krish
title: Its really worth it to buy this.
content: Everything is really good üëç in this.. Overall,I will rate 8.5 on a scale of 10.. Sound quality is really too good.. Bass could have some improvements.. Connectivity is good.. And the product is handy as well.. Overall,it's the best product at this price range.. I would recommend this for everyone who is seeking to buy earphones under 2000.Probably its among the best under 2k.

name: Ruban
title: Ok Product
content: I got it in sale for 900 rs. Worth for this price.. My major concern is battery. Most of the brand giving only 6 hrs battery backup at this price. But this battery is draining quicly. Im getting only 4 hrs sometimes. If you are regular user spend some money and go far 12 hrs battery backup earphones.

name: The Critic
title: Good earphones.
content: Nice stuff. Was very confused during selection of a Bluetooth earphones and finally settled for this skeptically. So far it had proved its worth. Wish battery life was longer though.

name: Eby Francis
title: Bad build quality?
content: Earphones are good in terms of sound quality. I received this in the morning and was trying to change the ear buds to the smaller ones. And then I saw that the metal like covering in one of the ear pieces came off a little. However I managed to place it back and it looks like this now. Donno if the earphones will stop working. I've used a lot of earphones and this Never happened with me before . Guys please use the same earbuds if possible!

name: shamasundar rao B.K
title: Do Not Buy!
content: Two months into this, having trouble with hearing, there seems to be sound lag. They are literally pain in the ears. I do not recommend this product at all.. Better not to have earphones at all than having this.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Bluetooth not working properly or isn't syncing with my cell
content: Everything's good. Until the real problem occured I don't know why the earphones continuosly got disconnected by my phone or the bluetooth gets disconnected or it says (no media) I replaced it and thus time there were no problems but after 10 days that problem occured again and is continuously occuring. This is getting on my nerves now. I want to return this item and I want a refund am fed up of this. Please refund my money

name: Saurav Singh
title: WORST EARPHONES AT THIS PRICE
content: PLEASE DONT BUY THIS ONE. BASE IS WORST,IT CREATES SOME KIND OF NOISE WHILE PLAYING MUSIC,AND NO YOU CANT PLAY GAMES ON THIS ONE LAGGING TIME IS TOO MUCH BELIEVE ME ,BOUGHT THIS ONLY 5 DAYS AGO WANT TO RETURN IT BUT NO YOU CANT,YOU CAN ONLY REPLACE THIS ITEM WITH THE SAME NEW ITEM.. WASTED MY 1300 RUPEES, EVEN SENHEISER CX 180 IS BETTER THAN THIS I HAVE USED IT ITS AWESOME GO FOR THAT. BUYING SONY OR SENHEISER NEXT TIME NOT HARMAN CRAP

name: jyoti sodhi
title: The earpiece caps don‚Äôt even stay in the ear and slips out
content: Why do you make that kinda earphones which don‚Äôt even stay in the ear and keeps slipping out. It‚Äôs totally irritating. No doubt the voice quality is great but this is one of the irritating factors. I seriously wanted to return the product but I couldn‚Äôt because I didn‚Äôt get that option as it was only left with option of replacement & what would I do of that replacement. Please try to bring some alternative. This is the biggest Cons of all.

name: BALIVADA
title: It's a fake product using JBL name.
content: The manufacturer duping valued customer by adding JBL name.Its sound quality is below substandard.100% waste product.Even it's not supporting to refund.Prompting for same product.Sound quality is 1 out of 10. noise Cancellation is 3 of 10 and bass quality is 1 out of 10.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Apart from battery it is a good product
content: This is indeed very good product. Bluetooth contact can cover a good area. However I am dissatisfied with it's battery backup. From 100% to 60% it is fine but it drops sharply after that within 5-10 minutes.

name: DILEEP
title: Good buy for music lovers!
content: Ordered Infinity Glide 120 earphone and got it delivered within 2 days.. First impressions.. very good. The neck band is not actually band, but it's a thick wire. So it feels very light around the neck and does not feel heavy. Sound quality is pretty decent. Good for music. Has dual mode. The bass mode has good bass effect and listening to music is really enjoyable. Overall a good product.

name: ARUN LAKSHMANAN VANIYA
title: Light weight and decent sound
content: Light weight. Nice design.1 year warranty Battery no satisfied. Calling okay no complaints yet

name: Nitin Deswal
title: Worth for the price/ Bad noise cancellation
content: Noise cancellation through mic is pretty bad. Background noise are easily picked up by the mic. It is worse than general wired earphones with mic.. Other than that, sound quality and bass are good for a budget bluetooth earphones.. Battery life is a bit if disappointment. Charging takes approximately an hour.

name: Ketan M.
title: Battery backup is very bad.
content: Sound quality is good. Bass is also good.. Look wise overall it's very good.. But it slips again and again from sholder during walk. And major drawback of this neckbend is battery backup. Manufacturer should do something about it's Battery , because battery drains very fast. If someone is thinking about to buy this neckbend he/she has to be charge it two times in a day if you use it continuesly, and trust me it's just a headache.

name: Radhish Kurup
title: Good sound, mic reception, battery. Poor hold on neck. 3hours to recharge
content: The hold is not good. it falls off from neck. Don't even think to lay down and talk. Great for calls. Good battery back up. On iPhone it shows the battery level. Recharge time is 3 hours and more. Awesome mic reception.

name: Aakashsinh Rathod
title: Excellent product
content: Very good product in wireless earphones. Value for money. Sound performance and its bass is very good and clear. No any other noise. The best thing is its company packing. If you are going to buy, just go for it without thinking much.. But one thing I found in my earphone is its calling connection feature. It doesn't work sometime when you connect to a call or receive a call.

name: CKSUBRAMANYAM
title: Prefarable product.
content: A/c to my view "Everything is good enough in this product".I liked the sound quality and if we talk about noise cancellation not too good but enough for users like me. The last but not the least that is Bass quality it is also good.Music lovers can choose this.Battery performance is just ok but not too good.

name: Nandan Gajendragadkar
title: Just go for it.
content: Value for money product. Perfect match of the sound and price you pay for it. Only upgrade could have been fast charge with 'type C' charge port.. Deep Bass feature has desired depth and high frequency reproduction has required sizzle to it. Metal buds keep sound tight, are sturdy, yet comfortable.

name: Neelam chouhan
title: Must buy.. Value for money
content: Best in this range of money i got this in 899rs. Sound quality is excellent specially its deep base mode. Easily connect with bluetooth. Material used is also comfortable and soft and looks very durable. Unlike others it has a covering lid over the charging slot which i really liked coz it help preventing any dust or water getting inside. Overall best earphons under 1000rs

name: Nelson K.D.
title: Does not fit in ear
content: Loudness less for calls with Iphone 6s. Returned the product after using it for a few days. The ear buds keeps falling off from ear. Purchased Boat wireless headphone which had wings for ear phones to keep it in place.

name: Shriniwas Rao

name: Ruwan Dave

name: Amazon Customer

In terms of sound and bass infinity glide is the winner as it as two dual equalisers which is very good . Even the built quality is very good in this too . As am using both the Bluetooth earphones , i just said my opinion .

name: Kanha
title: Worst headphones not worth a single rupee üëéüëéüëé

name: Srinivasarao G.

name: Harshit

name: SSS

name: Aktk

name: SAGAR GERA

Better that other wired bluetooth earphones.

name: Nammy
title: Horrible make and quality.
content: I genuinely do not recommend to buy this product.. 1. The ear buds pieces are not pasted well. 2. Its been 5 months and one ear piece has stopped working randomly.. Please not it hasnt fallen, or been in water nothing.. Its an absolute waste of money since anyway il have to buy a new one. Might as well buy a better headfone guys instead of spending on this one and then buying another in few months.

name: Viney
title: Lousy product

It takes more than 2 hrs to charge fully and even if it is off,the standby time is hardly 6-8 hrs. A big thumbs down to the product. Buy it only if u want to look at it, because you can't use it. Don't go by big names like Harman,JBL. Utterly useless.

name: Neeraj
title: Super earphones , jbl glide 120

Bass level in these are even better than atm50 ,. Trust me on that one ,. Negative reviews are not justified at all ,. Use it to believe it ,. Just go for it.

name: Rajesh Dhingra
title: Good budget bluetooth earphones
content: Amazing at 899 Rs. You still not get a good bluetooth at this price. But only for home use. You cannot use while traveling like on a scooter m or is so light that it can fly

name: Amazon Customer
title: Do not buy

name: Pavan

I couldn't test the sound properly.

name: pankaj kumar sarma

name: Saumyendu Chatterjee

I think under Rs. 2000, it's a better earphone..It is IPX5 rating..not to worry about sweat or splash..Very light weight..I think it's better than any earphone in this price sagement..Go for it without any doubt..Thanks HARMAN, for a nice Bluetooth earphone..üòäüòäüëåüëå‚ù§Ô∏è

name: Sumit Wadhawan

name: krishna

name: Sathish

name: Tj
title: Worst

name: shubham r.
title: Bass is on high and clarity  of the sound is truly awesome.

Need to replace the heahphone

name: Amazon Customer

name: Nishi

name: Kishan Solanki

name: neyha tolani

name: Prakash Chand

name: Shubhi Sharma

name: Sandeep Ahuja

name: Ashwani dagar

Overall a value for money specially when bought in the Amazon Great India festival sale.

name: Vivek Shukla

name: Ishika Agrawal

name: Mayur

name: A Durai Sundar

name: Sashi

name: Ritika Sharma

It would be better if coating was of plastic or sm hard material.

name: Amazon Customer

name: Sasidhar Reddy/Naveen Reddy

name: Raunak Borkar

name: lokesh s.

name: A. KUMAR

name: bharatesh

name: Pavan Kotipalli

name: Amazon Customer

name: Ksan

name: Harendra Singh
title: Bass is good
content: Sound quality is ok but highs are not too good, bass is awesome, ur ears can feel it.. I have Glide 100 also it has better sound quality highs are good, bass is also good.. Depends upon, what one wants.

name: pradeep bnv
title: No as Expected.
content: Positive review: Sound quality was good.. Negative feedback: While you talking to the when through this Bluetooth, the Opponent couldn't hear clearly very low voice is coming to them.. Distance wise paring strength not good as expected.. Some times pairing is disconnecting it self and connecting itself.

name: Rahul Verma
title: Connectivity not Good....
content: Sound is good, bass too good. But connectivity sooooo bad, when I connect this with my laptop and mobile same time, after 2-3 min drop the connction with phone.. 2nd when I turn on the device it take a long time for auto connect. I not recommend for buy this product. I returned this product...

name: sudeep
title: Built quality not good
content: After using it for 6 months, i can say its having good bluetooth range, good sound quality.. Built quality not as expected. Stopped working after 6 months. Submitted to service station but still not got replacement. Will see how fast they replace the one.. Instead i have boat 255 rockerz... Its working very good... Very good battery back up.. Go with boat.

name: Rishabh M.
title: Works excellent
content: I have been using these earphones for about 2 months now and the quality is perfect. Plus no tangled wires is a huge relief. Sound quality is perfect and plus point, even when your cell phone voice is full you can use the earphone's voice controller to increase the volume a bit (be careful about your ear's though). overall very good earphones.

name: GK
title: Value for money . Standard product as expected
content: If you are a music lover , you can go with this item without any doubt. No lag in blutooth connection, no problem with call connection. Decent battery life . Easy to carry in pocket as compared to stiff neck bands .

name: Syed
title: Best deal at this price....worth the money
content: Leave aside all false critiques....one week usage, works great and lasts long...light weight and sweat proof makes it ideal for cycling and jogging.. Flexible so work great in bed as well. Best deal at this price....worth the money

name: Abhilash
title: Left earphone not working
content: Product is good but after using for one month one of the earphone is not working and it is the second time im facing this problem.. first time when i ordered i got the piece with same problem after exchanging it and using this for a month im facing the same problem

name: amar axr
title: Good product üëç
content: Audio quality, build quality is good, but battery backup and USB connector protection socket is not good, Battery Backup is good in MI Sports BT earphone.

name: Praveen
title: Supports only SBC, Lag!!
content: This product supports only SBC codec which is old and slow, you will experience super lag while you use this product to watch videos, you wont notice the lag in audio-only playbacks, but audio-video is laggy and is out of sync due to the codec.

name: Addhu
title: good.but no Good
content: It is not at all comfortable due to the length of the wire.its not aligned properly in the neck as it slides in the neck.sound quality is average but bass quality is good,dual eq mode is very helpful.average mic quality the same holds for noice cancellation..

name: Chandresh Verma
title: Not worth INR 1195
content: Sounds not good. Quite bulky. Detailing is not as one may expect from a JBL product. I feel these are entry level headphones. Not the best value for money. Disappointed.

name: Amit
title: Nice one!
content: The sound quality is decent for it's price. The bass is good with the double equilizer but not that great. The earphones are light weight but not much comfortable could've been better. Overall built quality is good. A value for money product cause we don't get anything exceptional for 1k.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Great product.
content: Superb product , voice is very clear . Bass is good. Very light weight . Battery backeup is mind blowing . I used this 4 hours continuously still remains 40%. Got it @1199rs. during sale.. Must try it .

name: Munim Yadav
title: Great deal in this price range with infinity brand name
content: Now it's only 2 days being used... Every thing is good about these headphones just 1 point want to mention -. 1. Very rarely while using it for watching you tubes videos there is lag in audio. Need to disconnect and connect again then it starts working fine.. Else product is very good in terms of sound, handling, battery, connectivity.

name: Dharmesh93
title: "2week used review"
content: Pros: looks and feels good , above average sound for this price, light weight so good for long duration use.. Cons:- often fallouts while jogging or rope skiping, buttons are hard to reach while wearing, it's battery life around 5 hrs which is much less than competitors.... Anyway value for money product.

name: Abhishek
title: not worth it
content: main objective of using wireless earphones was i didn't wanted to adjust my earphones every second while walking or doing workout but the design of this is not for that it keeps falling or tilting on one side and using 10-20 mins my ears starts hurting i would suggest to go for other available alternative then buying this

name: Dr Sanket Dani
title: Don't expect anything great
content: Sound is ok. Nothing spectacular. Good low range. Poor comfort and buds don't stay in while working out or running. I ordered a cpl of plastic hooks which help them stay in place and solved the problem for now.. Overall nothing great but does the job. Buy only if u don't want to spend more than 1200 rupees

name: Subhan Biswas
title: Worst product ever by Harman
content: In the 3rd day of my use it's bluetooth stopped working and connectivity became slower. It isn't match up the voice in any video while streaming. It's response is very slow when you playing any game like PUBG. It's very disappointed to receive such worst working product by JBL.

name: Amazon Customer
title: 10 out of 5
content: I don't have those words in which I can explain it's quality of sound .. Gys just go for it you will forget every other brand. This is FATHER of all brands in terms of sound quality. Bass connectivity and one more thing don't bother about battery life more than 6hrs battery life.. I am providing it 10 out of 5. Just go for it. Love you infinity JBL

name: Rahul
title: Already opened box and issues with one speaker
content: I tried to contact the Amazon customer service.. The package I received was already opened as shown in the photos above. I think the package is not a new one. There is some noise with the headset, while connecting with the phone.. overall Iamnt satisfied with the purchase.. I couldn't return the thing since am out of station. First and worst experience with Amazon

name: jimmy
title: Very bad experience
content: Honest review- sound quality is extremely poor,you won‚Äôt hear any clear found,talk about bass there is no bass, very light weight but material looks really cheap, expected them to be genuine with decent sound quality but they failed in meeting my requirements. Do some market research before buying any wireless earphones as they are not upro the mark .

name: Jatin Gaikwad
title: Bass quality and connectivity is very very good
content: Bass is just best with no distortion at 100% volume and if you see low reviews they probably received defected pieces but this are best if you have tight budget. And if you are casual user 1 full charge is enough no latency while watching videos and i can even get perfect sound if my phone is on second floor but still depends on building.

name: Sam
title: Need flexibility? Take it.
content: Actually i was worried to see the curves in wire and i need a perfectly straight product but it doesn't disappoint me..it is super flexible and has great sound quality. I couldn't register waranty in the harman site as the product wasnt listed in the warranty search bar.. If you want a brand at low cost and uniqueness..go for it.

name: Shahid Wasta
title: You can't use this pair of earphones to TALK to people.
content: You can't use this pair of earphones to talk to people. The mic is positioned far from your mouth. The other parties keep complaining about extremely low volume. Placed a request to replace. Got the replacement. Even the replaced earphones have the same problem.

name: Joyal j.
title: Dont buy thiz , fake product has jbl brand only,,,
content: Dobt buy this product, fake product,,, first i buy this and i get a dameged product, ant its not connecting to any device ,,, i retun it and buy same once more then also get an opend pice , its also damaged so dont buy this plz buy any other genuine product, chek my pics this problems i faced on two products,,, first one Bluetooth problem and the headset earpice damaged on second,, wtf

name: George
title: It's like listening in yr car woofer . Awsesome:-)
content: Y d hell it's 3.8 *.. it sud b 7 *. Bass n clarity is awesome pro.. It's wow.. Njoying:-). Go for it guys. Mic is clear n good

name: Mayank
title: Best in this Price (Got it for 999), Magnet not that powerful
content: Sound quality is good and Bass is really good. Does the job and best in this price. (Got it for 999). Magnet not that powerful, it rarely sticks and easily drops on either side. Not recommended for using while working out.

name: santhosh cbr250
title: 8 months usage review. No battery life.
content: Its not worth the price, waste headsets. Battery comes hardly for 8hours stand-by. Earlier I had boult which needed charging after 1.5 days of usage. Next the button response js very bad. Power on and off is taking more than 5 seconds of hard press. When it was brand now it was around 3-4 seconds. My review is after 8 months usage.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Old technology
content: Firstly this is still using old technology,where we got in ear sensors and all.. Secondly if we connect to second device syncing of sound from a video will be highly variable I have experienced this several times. Apart from this sound and battery back up is good. You need charge everyday if you connect it to your phone for whole day and use excessively.

name: Rakesh Kumar Singh
title: Not that worth
content: Very light weight that you won't be able to realize even if it's taken away by someone slowly.. Sound quality is good but noise cancellation is a waste. Ear tips are small, though adjustable.

name: Sankalp Kini Agarwal
title: Worth it at its given cost
content: The sound quality is good.. Noise cancellation is good.. On a single charge,the earphone runs for the entire day.. The earphone wire is thin, compared to other earphones.

name: nipun g.
title: doesn't start
content: i have used this product for 2 months, and now suddenly it does not switch ON, i have tried pressing all the buttons, tried to reset, but it does not work. the product says 1 yr manufacturer warranty, but i do not know where to claim this warranty as Amazon site says the product return period is over but shows nothing about claiming warranty...

name: Divakar
title: Not at all good product
content: Not worth product at that price from Harman. Sound quality is not at all good. You get same quality for 200rupees product. Don‚Äôt waste your money on this item. Planning to return

name: Balaji
title: Ok product
content: Product is ok for 1099. Good for music. Mic quality is poor you have to be very close to the mic when in open place. No noise cancellation.. Battery life is ok.

name: Amit
title: Itchy Heary
content: There were some issues with microphone, seller promptly issued a replacement, but it also had same issues and had to return it. Got prompt refund.Thanks

name: Vishnu pillai
title: The real Harman quality
content: Quality is most important aspect of this earphones ,harman has done a good job by built quality , especially the Buds are premium metallic .. Sound is crystal clear and bass is ok type. Bluetooth connectivity is little weak in some conditions ,not expecting from Bluetooth 5.0. Comfort is also ok not so great but Fair and cool. In all its really a wonderful earphone , in a price range of 1399 , Dont go for Boat go for this

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very poor service from JBL harman
content: Please don't buy it, because only after one month my earphone got defective and within the warranty period on May 6th I registered my complaint but now till September 16th, I didn't get earphone back.

name: Gurkirat Singh
title: Need a better battery!
content: The led light is too close to the button, while pressing the button it's difficult to see the LED, to know whether it's on or off! Battery life isn't great too. I have to charge in every 2 days on 2 hours use daily.. Decent product sound wise.

name: Prashant Kr. Kanwal
title: Nice bluetooth earphone
content: Nice bluetooth earphone..... everything is good bass, sound and backup.....Its been now 2-3 months..I am using r glide 120....cheap and best...you can go for it

name: Amazon Customer
title: Ok ok
content: Product is good but bluetooth connectivity is not gud although it has 5.0 v.. Build quality is just ok.. Sound is gud coz it has 12mm driver.. This ok ok product.. Amazon service is really awesome.

name: Anant shet
title: Not good
content: Product not working properly , it disconnect after call for next call I have to reconnect . I planning to return but I purchased it in udupi Karnataka, and now I am in Baddies, himachal Pradesh . Can I return it from my present location? Kindly suggest.

name: Bhupender
title: Wonderful
content: Excellent sound quality & crisp treble and fine bass. My cousin have Boat Rokerz 225 but JBL infinity Glide120 Sound Quality is Far Better than Boat Rokerz 225. Its sound quality rocks you when you put it in high bass mode

name: Aakarshan Agrawal
title: Awesome built quality
content: In this price segment you can't find any better option against this as these have a long battery life and very good audio quality. You must go for it.

name: Funstorm
title: Awesome
content: Pros:. -Sound quality is 5/5.. -Build quality is 5/5. Cons:. -Ear bugs are slightly heavy. -fitting in ear is 3/5

name: Shanita
title: A poor product from Harman
content: The USB charging cover is flimsy, breaks in few uses. The default sound level is too high, the power button sometimes randomly calls people.

name: Parth Negi
title: Powerful bass!
content: Well first I ordered the Infinity Glide N100 but returned it as I was not impressed by its audio output. Then for ‚Çπ250 more I ordered Infinity GLIDE 120 and I am very impressed by its audio output especially the deep bass mode. Having downgrade from 13.5mm drivers to this 12mm driver, but equally impressed with the bass output. Very happy with the purchase.

name: Nikhil Singh
title: Good Product in the price range, Battery should be better
content: The build quality is super sturdy, the bass is perfect and thumpy. The highs and pitches are balanced. This is the most appropriate product in 1500 less range and delivers the right ammount of sound as expected. Infinity is a awesome brand. It should've a better battery for that matter.

name: Tech Raju Anala
title: Super degin and quality sound and bass üëç
content: Overall buds quality good and bass üëç super but only magnetic effect is very low wire and buds quality good overall I recommend this

name: Leomat. Cibi
title: Average On call voice Quality
content: Overall an average product.. On call voice quality is not that great, music wise - bass is OK. Earbuds cause little pain, tried with all three plugs. Battery life yet to test. Built quality is 4/5

name: M. Senthilvel
title: Value for money
content: It's a nice product, had issues with with connecting sometimes but just switch off bluetooth and switch on again in mobile and it works like a charm, may be issue with my mobile too, mine is oppof11 pro but with my other samsung I never faced this problem, I don't know about others but the battery drops very fast after 60% . Good for a days usage

name: Kanishk singh
title: Latency and delay
content: Not worth for this amount of money.. Genuinely expected a better product from JBL as they are the reputed company.. Sound quality is okay but latency is the problem while Playing games especially pubg. and calling is not upto expectations.. So conclusion is do not go for this if you have a medium budget research some more.

name: Pooja
title: Earphpones
content: I got the earphone 2 days back and it is really good and so handy and the Bluetooth connect and battery life is really awesome. The voice quality is also good go for it.

name: saptarshi
title: Used earphones, poor quality
content: I have received a used earphones where i found ear wax on ear buds. Wires were badly tangled and seal of the box was broken.. I didn‚Äôt expect I will receive a used item before getting its quality checked by AMAZON. I have bought same earphones earlier and it worked fine as it was brand new.

name: Dhiraj mane
title: Bluetooth not working proper ly
content: Problem with the product is when u r walking the product does not produce stable voice .voice is interupted and disturbance sound comes and that is irretating .as we are taking Bluetooth headphone for gym and walking purpose but it does not give that much output as what I expected from JBL or infinity by Harman company.

name: A J
title: Genuine & quality buy
content: True to its brand especially for music lovers... Amazing sound quality n quick response n connectivity.. N at a bestest price.. !! Got delivered within 2 days of order.. !

name: TEJPAL G.B.
title: Everything
content: Bass is more you can't enjoy the music, sound quality not expected as Brand JBL, noise cancellation ... (What is this) never expected. Battery is not expected I mean upto 50% it is fine after it drain fast and some time connected problem, I get a replacement in that cracking sound at 60% volume

name: Arnab
title: Hit on sound quality but with a pinch of latency.
content: Although the sound quality is amazing, I don't know whether it is specific with this model but there is latency. And it can be easily seen with movies and dialogues. Lip sync would be a hit and miss scenario. So, can't spend ‚Çπ1,199/- for hearing to songs only.

name: Akansha William
title: Amazing sound quality
content: Amazing sound quality and has a very strong base. Feel so comfortable. Sound quality is very clear. With the material which is it made of. Buy for others as well.

name: subhash prasad
title: Seller is fluctuating price badly
content: I bought it in 1399/- over all experience is good not best but the worst thing is after 7 days i found it was getting sold in 999/- and then after some day it was showing 1299/- in Amazon.. If I have bought it and after few days i see it is being sold in less amount (less than 400) i will feel cheated nothing else.

name: Shahanika yadav
title: Not fulfilled my priorities.
content: I found it comfortable because of its detached from mobile,, but it's irritate when its battery drain easily and rapidly,, needs to charge after 3-4 hrs use. And it's ear-rubber is big, unfit for me always drops from my ears. Irs better to buy conventional earphone with wire rather than this.

name: Arul Manickam
title: Mic volume too low
content: Sound quality is good but mic volume is too low and people aren't able to hear me when I speak.. have yo bring the mic closer. Defeats the purpose of being handsfree .

name: Amazon Customer
title: Average for 800
content: Sound quality not as good of my senneisher cx180. Battery also exhausted within 4 hrs from 100% charge. Look, feel, build quality all fine. Bass good but not heavy. Mids and trebles not that great.

name: Karthikeyan, SP
title: Could connect 2 mobiles at same time
content: Wonderful product. Surpassed all my expectations. No problem whatsoever experienced during hearing and talking.. Big advantage, I was able to pair 2 mobiles at the same time and it worked fine.

name: Flash
title: HiFi Sound
content: Mic while calling seems to be low, otherwise awesome in all aspect, speed of connection, usage time, range and the deal was good for me.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst build quality
content: It has one of the worst build quality. After using for 1-2 months rubber which stucks into your ears started coming off and after some weaks left side was not working and the thing came off. Plz not buy this earphone i will recommend boat rockerz those are much better.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Malfunctioning
content: Whether issue is with my unit, but a lot of malfunction. Bluatooth will gets disconnect while in call.. Bass will be there sometimes and will not be there other time.. However noise cancellation in calls is an issue since first day. And all this started after return period is over. May be my bad luck.

name: Puneet
title: Bad Service even after sale
content: Dont Buy this product. IF Broken undet Warranty its your headache to go to service center(which is same service centre for 5 diffrent brands ) wait there for 2 hours n then come back to pickup if you will be lucky. Wheras Boat Is provid9ng home pickup for there faulty stuff. For this mich money its such a pain.Mine stopped working within a week.

name: Vignesh N
title: Mic, speaker issue. Looks attaractive.
content: This is one of the worst device I have ever used. I asked for replacement as mic issue was there and received one, but still same issue with the replaced product. Sound quality is also not that good.. I Wasted my money

name: Rachna
title: Sound wise ok but not comfortable on ears
content: The ear piece keeps getting off from ear also if one is taking it for purpose of exercise or cycling or running then don‚Äôt bother with this one as the ear piece will pop off and neck back is super comfortable but does not hold unless together like neckband things. Battery is ok no problem with that

name: Ravi Gorakh
title: Not worthy
content: The image is showing that neck part is thick like Syska & Artis, but the neck round part is simply a thin wire like normal earphones & price on amazon is higher than regular market particular for this item. I paid 1400/- & after 1 day i was getting in 1100/- from market. Regarding product, it is not value for money.. WORST PRODUCT

name: Sharaaz K.
title: Ok ok
content: Their is not noise cancellation electronic feature its just the bud that blocks the air which is not good for long over all ok ok headphone sound quality cld go more better

name: Pratap
title: Loved it..go for this...
content: I am writing review after 2 months of use.... I loved this product...one can go with it...very good bluetooth range, very good sound quality...if you listen music you will love it ... used for calls and work wonder with good noise cancellation...I bought at 900 during some offer days..

name: Amazon Customer
title: The microphone stopped working after 2 weeks
content: The microphone stopped working. Amazon return period expired and did not take back the product . It asked to contact the manufacturer. So, trying to contact the manufacturer. Money wasted as I am stuck but more importantly, I am unable to work.

name: R√ÉJ √áH√òPR√Ñ
title: Sound and bass is awesome...
content: As according to Harman brand I haven't expected they will provide me a usage great experience with there product they have just beat there j.b.l product in comparison to glide 120 .... Really awesome go for it guys...

name: Mustafa S Hashim
title: Superhit Value for money product
content: Sound is just wow 9.5/10. Bass 8/10. Value for money 10/10. Blindly Go for it. Value for money product. I'm Loving it. Thanks JBL infinity For making such wonderful device @ an affordable price..!!

name: Aaquib jawed
title: Descasting products infinity JBL N120
content: Don't buy this JBL infinity N120 bluetooth earphone .. this product is very bad sound deep bass not clear.not parfactly use this nack and ear.... My advice don't buy this product ......paisa loss h ye earphone m .... Boat Rocker is the best ear phones sounds clear depp bass clear awesome sound..

name: Sreekant sharma
title: Good product but not so stable around neck
content: Great product , great sound quality, great battery life. A little disappointed with the connectivity but its still better than many others. But it is not so stable around the neck like a neckband so it ia a major flaw and i would recommend a neck band but if that is not an issue then it is very good.

name: Sachin
title: Chinese product
content: Product seems ok but the problem with battery back and moreover I bought this product for a non Chinese product but once I open the box it is made in China product.

name: Uday
title: Mic is worst
content: Speakers are very mice but mic is too worst.. I dont know how these many people ignored the mic quality while writing the review

name: Amazon Customer
title: Sounds shudders
content: It's not worth buying. It has nice audio quality but the it feels the audio is lagging and stops for micro seconds in between. You can really feel the difference when you are really enjoying a good bass music. It also lag sometimes when i put my phone in the pocket. I am not really satisfied with this product. Instead go for boat or oneplus.

name: Arjun
title: Best in its quality
content: The best thing to start the review for this product is it's noise cancellation. I can give five star rating for that. The sound quality is so good and with clarity. Coming to the bass, it is provided with deep bass and normal bass. The deep bass is some what disturbing. Beside that I see no problem. Value for money. Thank you.

name: Pradeep
title: Twice received Defective piece. Worst product
content: When i ordered 1st time got defective one, requested for replacement even 2nd time got damaged piece. I do not recommend this product.

name: Ruturaj
title: Defective Product.
content: These JBL headphone are good for sound and battery backup. Sadly i wouldn't recommend buying them as the ones i bought stopped working after 10 days and i had to contact the company to replace it as Amazon's exchange limit had gotten over and no help was received even after explaining the situation.

name: Akshay P.
title: Nice sound with good battery
content: I have used this for daily 1 hours while drive to office from and comeback in traffic that time also smooth calling possible due to this. And also i have use for gaming and music in weekend for 1-2 hours . Means daily 1 hour usage and battery working for 10-15 days. So everything is good for Rs.1000

name: lijo
title: Awesome.. good to have
content: I got this buds today.. being fully charged.. I tested through 3 hours.. the battery seems awesome.. I am quite happy with the sound quality and comfort. Connectivity on the first device and consecutive other device was pretty good. Overall experience with this buds so far is good.. will post future updates in a week or two..

name: Yogeshwar Shukla
title: overall 2.5/5
content: The only good thing you get is the sound quality.. The cons are listed below:. - Poor battery backup (battery get drains within 3-4 hours). - Really bad AI (connectivity issues). - Noise cancellation is worst (produces too much noise during call). overall I'm not satisfied with it's performance

name: Customer
title: Affordable price
content: Somehow it doesn't fit in my ears properly and comes out if i exercise . calling experience was good .. noise cancellation is ok. It has two mode normal and deep bass mode which is a good thing.

name: anurag
title: Its all about your ears. Carefull.
content: Not comfortable with my ears , cant wear not more than 30 min ,oftem comes out of your ears.. Amazon policy: its also not customer friendly.. There is no return policy. Which is pathetic.. Just for the saving of few buck we are comprising with comfort. Beware there is only replacement.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Awesome product and don't buy if Ur a gamer
content: Well everything is awesome but one thing I didn't like is wn Ur playing games like pubg call of duty or other good games there is lag in sound 1 sec delay of sound , other than that no complaints about it , don't buy this if Ur the one who play big games on phone

name: Narasimha
title: Not Orginal JBL
content: Amazon delivered refurbished product and claiming as fresh product when it was not working after10days. Manufacture says he will not replace this product if required he will service with paid.. Now I have become helpless.. Is anybody can support how to get refund for this product.

name: Jithin Gopi
title: Mic not good
content: Mic is not functional properly, background noise is more loud then what we speak. The person on the other side is hardly able to hear us.. The sound quality is also not upto the mark, it's sounds heavy and a little different sound the actual sound.

name: KD
title: JBL has no value for customer
content: Charging socket got burnt on first charge itself at now it is not charging. JBL customer care says it is not thier fault and can do nothing about it. Basically they cant do anything for providing me a defective piece! Waste of money and time and total loss in loyalty for JBL. I will recommend Boat earphones anytime after this experience.

name: Rachit Sanghani
title: The best neckband in the price range
content: Awesome experience. Bass is great, sound is awesome, battery life is awesome.. super light weight. no connectivity issues

name: Anil
title: Not good
content: Duplicate product, it's been miss guided that it's JBL as well as Harman product

name: nidhi chaudhary
title: Amazing sound quality
content: The only tip is- when you want to turn it off, turn off bluetooth of your phone first and then press the button if earphones to switch it off else a call gets connected automatically to last dialed.

name: Sumitava Chatterjee
title: Wastage of money
content: Got Automatically disconnected from phone.. Sometimes could not hear after connecting also. Then again i have to reconnect then i can hear.. Quality not up to the mark... This problem happens in JBL , realme and boat also... So before buying just think once. Dont wastage ur money in this Covid situation....

name: Ashok kumar.N
title: KEEPS FALLING, CAUSES EAR PAIN AFTER 1HR ITSELF.
content: It never stays in your ear, it keeps falling. When u laid on your bed and watch a movie and some time later u wake up / stand still it will fell down abruptly. Not a great choice for workout it running or keeps falling miserably. PLEASE CHOOSE WISELY.

name: Sonika
title: Good for listening music as well as calling..Satisfied..
content: Sound quality is good, bass is ok, noise cancellation very good... Our voice heard by the other person while calling is very clear... Really a good product, that too at an ok price.. Worth it's price..

name: manwinder singh
title: This is not jbl brand , please mention clearly on it , dont lie amazon , selling on name of jbl
content: Sound quality is ok , but this is not jbl , dont sell by publishing jbl name , i havnt find a single name of jbl on the box or on wireless earbuds ,i got this in 899 which i think is genuine amount . There isnt any logo on ear bugs of jbl and even they havnt mention left and right mark on any ear buds , battery back is ok

name: SD
title: Nice & Trendy
content: If I had more stars I would have given it doe battery life .. it is just amazing .. good sound quality .. worth the purchase üëçüèª

name: Amit Soni
title: Noice quality and usability not upto the mark.
content: The blutooth connection is not stable. Many times it start humming noice in the background. And you need to power off the headband and re-start.. Noice cancellation not support, as the person listening over the receiver end, always complaints about low noice, or some disturbance.. I suggest to go with some better alternative...

name: Nikita
title: Excellent
content: I'm using this earphones for about 3 months now. Liked this earphones alot. Best in class sound quality, no doubt about Harman, best feature is that we can switch between deep bass and normal bass, battery capacity is also good, and for this price it is the best bluetooth earphones.

name: shyam sundar
title: Good sound but not very comfortable for the ear
content: Very good sound quality but not very comfortable in the ear.. Edit after 3 months: ears hurt while using even now. Will not buy this ever again.

name: monica
title: Bad design for left handers
content: Design is not for left handed persons. Even with right handed persons this is not convenient one.. bad design..I should go on with some other company..hereaftwards

name: Shrirang
title: Buy only if you want it to listen to music. Its definitely not made for calls.
content: This device is perfect for entertainment purpose. Its worth the money i spent. i bought it for 1099. But i cannot use it to attend calls. The person at the other end complains about too much background noise. Noice cancellation does not exist on this earphone. if you are buying this only to listen to music then you will not be wrong.

name: naveenkumar
title: Not worth for money
content: After 10 days of usage ,ear phone speaker fault.now im waiting to repair or replacement at service center..due to conflict of working hours between our office timing and service center working hours difficult to get service..better buy the high cost item as it could be durable.battery timing is up to. 5.30 hrs only

name: Madhuri Tembhurnikar
title: I purchased it for INR 1299/-
content: Pros:. 1) More comfortable than other earphones because of the flexible neckband.. 2) Sound quality s comparatively better than any other earphones in the same range.. 3) Perfectly fits in the ear.. Cons:. 1) Battery capacity is bit lower.

name: Prateek
title: Technical fault
content: I have just opened the pack and charged these earphones completely.. Pairing with the phone was smooth. However, slight movement leaves a non-stop crackling sound especially in the left ear.

name: Suryakant Ravi
title: A superb product.
content: I purchased this product from Amazon on prime day sale at Rs. 999.. 1. Believe me its sound quality, noise cancellation and bass quantity is awesome.. 2. It contect with two device at a time.. 3. Range of the bluetooth is good.

name: chhavi p.
title: Cool product at reasonable price
content: Got it at 845 .. battery backup could be better .. if you want high bass go for boat 255 . If you are looking for balanced sound quality then it is for you.you can't sleep With plugged it in your ear.

name: Rahul Sasmal
title: Amazing
content: Superb sound quality

name: Manoj Somwanshi
title: Easy to use accessory
content: Works fine as expected, only thing i found annoying personally is the wire length for ear buds is slightly shorter for Indian Physiques. While moving, this results in the mic going behind the head. Also connecting the 2 ear buds magnetically does not pause the song. A feature which is commonly available with most other competitors.

name: Reena g.
title: Shame on this bad reviews
content: This product is excellent. Nice bass and battery backup. I used this for 2 days. I bought this product for 899. Excellent one at this price.. I had a JBL tune 205. When compared this one's better and less price and one year warranty . Go for it

name: Chetan Chavan
title: Design is not user friendly
content: Voice quality is good. But it's design is not user friendly. If we use this while working, it's not stable on neck. It's falls down very easily. So will not prefer this to any customer to buy as for Bluetooth application.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Bad product
content: This keeps falling while walking fast, forget exercising. Again, the buds replacement is of no use. The neck band wire is so fragile it just keeps falling of the neck to one side. Its just an ill engineered product. I was using boat rockers 255 before this, they were really good.

name: Bhanu Pratap Singh

name: Sharmila
title: Battery is the worst!
content: I have the boat one and the battery lasts for 2 days minimum. This one, even though I hardly use it, the battery dies in a day. Sound quality is okay but I prefer the boat one. Issue with both the earphones is that, they keep sliding and falling off the ears and also hurt the ear. Other than that, boat is way better.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Infinity boom
content: Bass quality is bang on. Built quality is also good at this price point. the only draw back is battery backup. It hardly last for a day. But remember this product is from the house of Harman.

name: Mithun
title: Buy it

name: Nilesh Sawant
title: Cannot Register for Warranty

name: ARUN P NARENDRAN

name: Sunny Thakur

Highly Recommended

name: Tanuj
title: Useless.. do not purchase regular customer... No benifit... Wastage of money

name: sudar

Now I lost the part with earbud somewhere.. Sound quality is excellent at this price point.

name: Karthik
title: Bad experience..

name: Amazon Customer

name: San

name: Mk
title: Don't buy

This is my 2nd piece already i have recieved damaged piece then i replace it but still it is worst product from JBL

name: V.Vijayakumar goud

name: Vipin Singh Rawat
title: Bass Monster
content: Guys, when you hear names like Infinity or Harman, look no further. This particular product is for bass lovers only as it does not have strong vocals. I bought this as I love bass over strong vocals. The feel, touch and function reeks quality. Infinity makes one of the best components car speakers too. Go for it!

name: Pratik
title: Beware don't buy

name: Abhishek
title: Disappointed with the sound quality.

name: Anuj Singh
title: Budget Headphones

title: Wrost quality product. Don't go for it

name: Eshan Kerketta
title: Awesome product
content: Really nice and also worth it's price.. The sound quality is just awesome.. The bass quality is also nice.

name: Robin
title: Build quality poor
content: Sound quality is nice but the build quality is not so great it stopped working properly and a week later it stopped charging also the number of service centre being limited causes more problem to return the product even though being in warranty

name: williams
title: Unbelievable product
content: Quality 5/5. Bass 5/5. Battery 5/5. One word for all.... mesmerizing...

name: Nifty
title: Do reconsider before buying online.
content: BT connectivity is good but the audio quality specially the ambient noise cancellation is very poor.. Also we cannot have it registered online on JBL site. Looks like a fake product.

name: Satish
title: Value for money
content: GooD BT headphone. Infinity and JBL variants are both manufactured by Harman. Still JBL is far better than infinity.. If your pocket allows then go for JBL than Infinity.

name: Pushkar Singh
title: Very muddy sound. Not good.

name: Prashanna B.
title: Good speakers and average mic and average battery . Worth the money (899rs)
content: Battery backup is average , don't expect more than 5hrs.. Deep bass gives undistorted bass. No flaw in that. But the mic picks all the noise around you and that'll make the other end person annoy. Not a great choice for Phone call usage.

name: Abijith
title: It's is over priced
content: This provides a decent sound quality with amazing bass . If u are checking for a truly wireless neck band go for it . It has JBL's Signature Sound . But I think it is overpriced

name: Amazon Customer
title: Keeps slipping off
content: It's good when you're seated. But while walking around or riding, this is purely useless in terms of sticking on to your neck.. It just goes haywire and gets pretty frustrating.

name: karthik
title: DON'T Buy one side stopped working
content: One side stopped working within month I bought it on Diwali sale, at start It was good then left side stopped working please go for other product. Now I need to claim warranty for this since I can't return. But sound quality and other thing was good. Choose wisely.

name: Ankur patel
title: Completely product .
content: Completely faulty product , can't even say this is the orginal prodcut . Returned this JBL within 10 minitues after delivery . Thank you so much for bad prodcut

name: Nikhil
title: battery backup is less
content: Really like this item as for long listening feature. but battery backup is very poor as it is discharging in 2 hrs and need again charging, plus the call failure..... as we cannot talk to a person long enough as it is getting discharge while on call

name: Amazon Customer
title: Defected piece.
content: Worst product I have ever purchased. Bluetooth connectivity is very poor, it gets off automatically within 2-3 minutes. I have to reconnect again and again.. Very irritating.. I felt I have been cheated and duplicate product has been sold to me.

name: Shaikh Sohaib
title: Poor Battery life

name: poorna chandra rao

name: Anurag Das
title: Good but soft hanging on neck.

name: ARPAN KUMAR
title: Best Sound quality under such price.

name: Amazon Customer

name: Ahmad Waqar
title: Clear and Comfortable

name: pritam nayak
title: bluetooth connectivity issue

name: rajat
title: INFINITY GLIDE 120 üéß review

name: BISWAJIT BEHERA
title: Better product

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not for Sports.

name: K Pradhan
title: A Dont Buy Product

name: Kumar
title: Better than expected !

name: Saikat Santra

name: Alursrikar
title: Genuine review,like me

name: Disha
title: Disappointed

name: Phani Kumar Munnangi

name: Richard Ukkan

name: Amazon Customer

name: Bineesh Cherian

name: Jai L.
